1// This is an auto-generated header-only single-file distribution of libcluon.
2// Date: Sun, 03 Nov 2019 15:21:13 +0100
3// Version: 0.0.127
4//
5//
6// Implementation of N4562 std::experimental::any (merged into C++17) for C++11 compilers.
7//
8// See also:
9// + http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/any
10// + http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/experimental/any
11// + http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2015/n4562.html#any
12// + https://cplusplus.github.io/LWG/lwg-active.html#2509

18// file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)

20#ifndef LINB_ANY_HPP
21#define LINB_ANY_HPP
22//#pragma once
23#include <typeinfo>
24#include <type_traits>
25#include <stdexcept>
26
27
28#if defined(PARTICLE)
29#if !defined(__cpp_exceptions) && !defined(ANY_IMPL_NO_EXCEPTIONS) && !defined(ANY_IMPL_EXCEPTIONS)
30# define ANY_IMPL_NO_EXCEPTIONS
31# endif
32#else
33// you can opt-out of exceptions by definining ANY_IMPL_NO_EXCEPTIONS,
34// but you must ensure not to cast badly when passing an `any' object to any_cast<T>(any)
35#endif
36
37#if defined(PARTICLE)
38#if !defined(__cpp_rtti) && !defined(ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI) && !defined(ANY_IMPL_RTTI)
39# define ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI
40# endif
41#else
42// you can opt-out of RTTI by defining ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI,
43// in order to disable functions working with the typeid of a type
44#endif

47namespace linb
48{
49
50class bad_any_cast : public std::bad_cast
51{
52public:
53 const char* what() const noexcept override
54 {
55 return "bad any cast";
56 }
57};
58
59class any final
60{
61public:
63 any() :
64 vtable(nullptr)
65 {
66 }
67
69 any(const any& rhs) :
70 vtable(rhs.vtable)
71 {
72 if(!rhs.empty())
73 {
74 rhs.vtable->copy(rhs.storage, this->storage);
75 }
76 }
77
80 any(any&& rhs) noexcept :
81 vtable(rhs.vtable)
82 {
83 if(!rhs.empty())
84 {
85 rhs.vtable->move(rhs.storage, this->storage);
86 rhs.vtable = nullptr;
87 }
88 }
89
91 ~any()
92 {
93 this->clear();
94 }
95
100 template<typename ValueType, typename = typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<typename std::decay<ValueType>::type, any>::value>::type>
101 any(ValueType&& value)
102 {
103 static_assert(std::is_copy_constructible<typename std::decay<ValueType>::type>::value,
104 "T shall satisfy the CopyConstructible requirements.");
105 this->construct(std::forward<ValueType>(value));
106 }
107
109 any& operator=(const any& rhs)
110 {
111 any(rhs).swap(*this);
112 return *this;
113 }
114
119 any& operator=(any&& rhs) noexcept
120 {
121 any(std::move(rhs)).swap(*this);
122 return *this;
123 }
124
129 template<typename ValueType, typename = typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<typename std::decay<ValueType>::type, any>::value>::type>
130 any& operator=(ValueType&& value)
131 {
132 static_assert(std::is_copy_constructible<typename std::decay<ValueType>::type>::value,
133 "T shall satisfy the CopyConstructible requirements.");
134 any(std::forward<ValueType>(value)).swap(*this);
135 return *this;
136 }
137
139 void clear() noexcept
140 {
141 if(!empty())
142 {
143 this->vtable->destroy(storage);
144 this->vtable = nullptr;
145 }
146 }
147
149 bool empty() const noexcept
150 {
151 return this->vtable == nullptr;
152 }
153
154#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI
156 const std::type_info& type() const noexcept
157 {
158 return empty()? typeid(void) : this->vtable->type();
159 }
160#endif
161
163 void swap(any& rhs) noexcept
164 {
165 if(this->vtable != rhs.vtable)
166 {
167 any tmp(std::move(rhs));
168
169 // move from *this to rhs.
170 rhs.vtable = this->vtable;
171 if(this->vtable != nullptr)
172 {
173 this->vtable->move(this->storage, rhs.storage);
174 //this->vtable = nullptr; -- unneeded, see below
175 }
176
177 // move from tmp (previously rhs) to *this.
178 this->vtable = tmp.vtable;
179 if(tmp.vtable != nullptr)
180 {
181 tmp.vtable->move(tmp.storage, this->storage);
182 tmp.vtable = nullptr;
183 }
184 }
185 else // same types
186 {
187 if(this->vtable != nullptr)
188 this->vtable->swap(this->storage, rhs.storage);
189 }
190 }
191
192private: // Storage and Virtual Method Table
193
194 union storage_union
195 {
196 using stack_storage_t = typename std::aligned_storage<2 * sizeof(void*), std::alignment_of<void*>::value>::type;
197
198 void* dynamic;
199 stack_storage_t stack; // 2 words for e.g. shared_ptr
200 };
201
203 struct vtable_type
204 {
205 // Note: The caller is responssible for doing .vtable = nullptr after destructful operations
206 // such as destroy() and/or move().
207
208#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI
210 const std::type_info& (*type)() noexcept;
211#endif
212
215 void(*destroy)(storage_union&) noexcept;
216
219 void(*copy)(const storage_union& src, storage_union& dest);
220
223 void(*move)(storage_union& src, storage_union& dest) noexcept;
224
226 void(*swap)(storage_union& lhs, storage_union& rhs) noexcept;
227 };
228
230 template<typename T>
231 struct vtable_dynamic
232 {
233#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI
234 static const std::type_info& type() noexcept
235 {
236 return typeid(T);
237 }
238#endif
239
240 static void destroy(storage_union& storage) noexcept
241 {
242 //assert(reinterpret_cast<T*>(storage.dynamic));
243 delete reinterpret_cast<T*>(storage.dynamic);
244 }
245
246 static void copy(const storage_union& src, storage_union& dest)
247 {
248 dest.dynamic = new T(*reinterpret_cast<const T*>(src.dynamic));
249 }
250
251 static void move(storage_union& src, storage_union& dest) noexcept
252 {
253 dest.dynamic = src.dynamic;
254 src.dynamic = nullptr;
255 }
256
257 static void swap(storage_union& lhs, storage_union& rhs) noexcept
258 {
259 // just exchage the storage pointers.
260 std::swap(lhs.dynamic, rhs.dynamic);
261 }
262 };
263
265 template<typename T>
266 struct vtable_stack
267 {
268#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI
269 static const std::type_info& type() noexcept
270 {
271 return typeid(T);
272 }
273#endif
274
275 static void destroy(storage_union& storage) noexcept
276 {
277 reinterpret_cast<T*>(&storage.stack)->~T();
278 }
279
280 static void copy(const storage_union& src, storage_union& dest)
281 {
282 new (&dest.stack) T(reinterpret_cast<const T&>(src.stack));
283 }
284
285 static void move(storage_union& src, storage_union& dest) noexcept
286 {
287 // one of the conditions for using vtable_stack is a nothrow move constructor,
288 // so this move constructor will never throw a exception.
289 new (&dest.stack) T(std::move(reinterpret_cast<T&>(src.stack)));
290 destroy(src);
291 }
292
293 static void swap(storage_union& lhs, storage_union& rhs) noexcept
294 {
295 storage_union tmp_storage;
296 move(rhs, tmp_storage);
297 move(lhs, rhs);
298 move(tmp_storage, lhs);
299 }
300 };
301
303 template<typename T>
304 struct requires_allocation :
305 std::integral_constant<bool,
306 !(std::is_nothrow_move_constructible<T>::value // N4562 Â§6.3/3 [any.class]
307 && sizeof(T) <= sizeof(storage_union::stack)
308 && std::alignment_of<T>::value <= std::alignment_of<storage_union::stack_storage_t>::value)>
309 {};
310
312 template<typename T>
313 static vtable_type* vtable_for_type()
314 {
315 using VTableType = typename std::conditional<requires_allocation<T>::value, vtable_dynamic<T>, vtable_stack<T>>::type;
316 static vtable_type table = {
317#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_RTTI
318 VTableType::type,
319#endif
320 VTableType::destroy,
321 VTableType::copy, VTableType::move,
322 VTableType::swap,
323 };
324 return &table;
325 }
326
327protected:
328 template<typename T>
329 friend const T* any_cast(const any* operand) noexcept;
330 template<typename T>
331 friend T* any_cast(any* operand) noexcept;
332
334 template<typename T>
335 const T* cast() const noexcept
336 {
337 return requires_allocation<typename std::decay<T>::type>::value?
338 reinterpret_cast<const T*>(storage.dynamic) :
339 reinterpret_cast<const T*>(&storage.stack);
340 }
341
343 template<typename T>
344 T* cast() noexcept
345 {
346 return requires_allocation<typename std::decay<T>::type>::value?
347 reinterpret_cast<T*>(storage.dynamic) :
348 reinterpret_cast<T*>(&storage.stack);
349 }
350
351private:
352 storage_union storage; // on offset(0) so no padding for align
353 vtable_type* vtable;
354
355 template<typename ValueType, typename T>
356 typename std::enable_if<requires_allocation<T>::value>::type
357 do_construct(ValueType&& value)
358 {
359 storage.dynamic = new T(std::forward<ValueType>(value));
360 }
361
362 template<typename ValueType, typename T>
363 typename std::enable_if<!requires_allocation<T>::value>::type
364 do_construct(ValueType&& value)
365 {
366 new (&storage.stack) T(std::forward<ValueType>(value));
367 }
368
371 template<typename ValueType>
372 void construct(ValueType&& value)
373 {
374 using T = typename std::decay<ValueType>::type;
375
376 this->vtable = vtable_for_type<T>();
377
378 do_construct<ValueType,T>(std::forward<ValueType>(value));
379 }
380};
381
382
383
384namespace detail
385{
386 template<typename ValueType>
387 inline ValueType any_cast_move_if_true(typename std::remove_reference<ValueType>::type* p, std::true_type)
388 {
389 return std::move(*p);
390 }
391
392 template<typename ValueType>
393 inline ValueType any_cast_move_if_true(typename std::remove_reference<ValueType>::type* p, std::false_type)
394 {
395 return *p;
396 }
397}
398
400template<typename ValueType>
401inline ValueType any_cast(const any& operand)
402{
403 auto p = any_cast<typename std::add_const<typename std::remove_reference<ValueType>::type>::type>(&operand);
404#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_EXCEPTIONS
405 if(p == nullptr) throw bad_any_cast();
406#endif
407 return *p;
408}
409
411template<typename ValueType>
412inline ValueType any_cast(any& operand)
413{
414 auto p = any_cast<typename std::remove_reference<ValueType>::type>(&operand);
415#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_EXCEPTIONS
416 if(p == nullptr) throw bad_any_cast();
417#endif
418 return *p;
419}
420
426template<typename ValueType>
427inline ValueType any_cast(any&& operand)
428{
429 using can_move = std::integral_constant<bool,
430 std::is_move_constructible<ValueType>::value
431 && !std::is_lvalue_reference<ValueType>::value>;
432
433 auto p = any_cast<typename std::remove_reference<ValueType>::type>(&operand);
434#ifndef ANY_IMPL_NO_EXCEPTIONS
435 if(p == nullptr) throw bad_any_cast();
436#endif
437 return detail::any_cast_move_if_true<ValueType>(p, can_move());
438}
439
442template<typename ValueType>
443inline const ValueType* any_cast(const any* operand) noexcept
444{
445 using T = typename std::decay<ValueType>::type;
446
447 if (operand && operand->vtable == any::vtable_for_type<T>())
448 return operand->cast<ValueType>();
449 else
450 return nullptr;
451}
452
455template<typename ValueType>
456inline ValueType* any_cast(any* operand) noexcept
457{
458 using T = typename std::decay<ValueType>::type;
459
460 if (operand && operand->vtable == any::vtable_for_type<T>())
461 return operand->cast<ValueType>();
462 else
463 return nullptr;
464}
465
466}
467
468namespace std
469{
470 inline void swap(linb::any& lhs, linb::any& rhs) noexcept
471 {
472 lhs.swap(rhs);
473 }
474}

484#ifndef CPPPEGLIB_PEGLIB_H
485#define CPPPEGLIB_PEGLIB_H
486
487#include <algorithm>
488#include <cctype>
489#include <cassert>
490#include <cstring>
491#include <functional>
492#include <initializer_list>
493#include <iostream>
494#include <limits>
495#include <map>
496#include <memory>
497#include <mutex>
498#include <set>
499#include <string>
500#include <unordered_map>
501#include <vector>

503// guard for older versions of VC++
504#ifdef _MSC_VER
505// VS2013 has no constexpr
506#if (_MSC_VER == 1800)
507#define PEGLIB_NO_CONSTEXPR_SUPPORT
508#elif (_MSC_VER >= 1800)
509// good to go
510#else //(_MSC_VER < 1800)
511#error "Requires C+11 support"
512#endif
513#endif

516// source code

519namespace peg {
520
521/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
522 * any
523 *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
524
525class any
526{
527public:
528 any() : content_(nullptr) {}
529
530 any(const any& rhs) : content_(rhs.clone()) {}
531
532 any(any&& rhs) : content_(rhs.content_) {
533 rhs.content_ = nullptr;
534 }
535
536 template <typename T>
537 any(const T& value) : content_(new holder<T>(value)) {}
538
539 any& operator=(const any& rhs) {
540 if (this != &rhs) {
541 if (content_) {
542 delete content_;
543 }
544 content_ = rhs.clone();
545 }
546 return *this;
547 }
548
549 any& operator=(any&& rhs) {
550 if (this != &rhs) {
551 if (content_) {
552 delete content_;
553 }
554 content_ = rhs.content_;
555 rhs.content_ = nullptr;
556 }
557 return *this;
558 }
559
560 ~any() {
561 delete content_;
562 }
563
564 bool is_undefined() const {
565 return content_ == nullptr;
566 }
567
568 template <
569 typename T,
570 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<T, any>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr
571 >
572 T& get() {
573 if (!content_) {
574 throw std::bad_cast();
575 }
576 auto p = dynamic_cast<holder<T>*>(content_);
577 assert(p);
578 if (!p) {
579 throw std::bad_cast();
580 }
581 return p->value_;
582 }
583
584 template <
585 typename T,
586 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<T, any>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr
587 >
588 T& get() {
589 return *this;
590 }
591
592 template <
593 typename T,
594 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<T, any>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr
595 >
596 const T& get() const {
597 assert(content_);
598 auto p = dynamic_cast<holder<T>*>(content_);
599 assert(p);
600 if (!p) {
601 throw std::bad_cast();
602 }
603 return p->value_;
604 }
605
606 template <
607 typename T,
608 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<T, any>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr
609 >
610 const any& get() const {
611 return *this;
612 }
613
614private:
615 struct placeholder {
616 virtual ~placeholder() {}
617 virtual placeholder* clone() const = 0;
618 };
619
620 template <typename T>
621 struct holder : placeholder {
622 holder(const T& value) : value_(value) {}
623 placeholder* clone() const override {
624 return new holder(value_);
625 }
626 T value_;
627 };
628
629 placeholder* clone() const {
630 return content_ ? content_->clone() : nullptr;
631 }
632
633 placeholder* content_;
634};
635
636/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
637 * scope_exit
638 *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
639
640// This is based on "http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2014/n4189".
641
642template <typename EF>
643struct scope_exit
644{
645 explicit scope_exit(EF&& f)
646 : exit_function(std::move(f))
647 , execute_on_destruction{true} {}
648
649 scope_exit(scope_exit&& rhs)
650 : exit_function(std::move(rhs.exit_function))
651 , execute_on_destruction{rhs.execute_on_destruction} {
652 rhs.release();
653 }
654
655 ~scope_exit() {
656 if (execute_on_destruction) {
657 this->exit_function();
658 }
659 }
660
661 void release() {
662 this->execute_on_destruction = false;
663 }
664
665private:
666 scope_exit(const scope_exit&) = delete;
667 void operator=(const scope_exit&) = delete;
668 scope_exit& operator=(scope_exit&&) = delete;
669
670 EF exit_function;
671 bool execute_on_destruction;
672};
673
674template <typename EF>
675auto make_scope_exit(EF&& exit_function) -> scope_exit<EF> {
676 return scope_exit<typename std::remove_reference<EF>::type>(std::forward<EF>(exit_function));
677}
678
679/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
680 * UTF8 functions
681 *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
682
683inline size_t codepoint_length(const char *s8, size_t l) {
684 if (l) {
685 auto b = static_cast<uint8_t>(s8[0]);
686 if ((b & 0x80) == 0) {
687 return 1;
688 } else if ((b & 0xE0) == 0xC0) {
689 return 2;
690 } else if ((b & 0xF0) == 0xE0) {
691 return 3;
692 } else if ((b & 0xF8) == 0xF0) {
693 return 4;
694 }
695 }
696 return 0;
697}
698
699inline size_t encode_codepoint(char32_t cp, char *buff) {
700 if (cp < 0x0080) {
701 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(cp & 0x7F);
702 return 1;
703 } else if (cp < 0x0800) {
704 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xC0 | ((cp >> 6) & 0x1F));
705 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (cp & 0x3F));
706 return 2;
707 } else if (cp < 0xD800) {
708 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xE0 | ((cp >> 12) & 0xF));
709 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((cp >> 6) & 0x3F));
710 buff[2] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (cp & 0x3F));
711 return 3;
712 } else if (cp < 0xE000) {
713 // D800 - DFFF is invalid...
714 return 0;
715 } else if (cp < 0x10000) {
716 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xE0 | ((cp >> 12) & 0xF));
717 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((cp >> 6) & 0x3F));
718 buff[2] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (cp & 0x3F));
719 return 3;
720 } else if (cp < 0x110000) {
721 buff[0] = static_cast<char>(0xF0 | ((cp >> 18) & 0x7));
722 buff[1] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((cp >> 12) & 0x3F));
723 buff[2] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | ((cp >> 6) & 0x3F));
724 buff[3] = static_cast<char>(0x80 | (cp & 0x3F));
725 return 4;
726 }
727 return 0;
728}
729
730inline std::string encode_codepoint(char32_t cp) {
731 char buff[4];
732 auto l = encode_codepoint(cp, buff);
733 return std::string(buff, l);
734}
735
736inline bool decode_codepoint(const char *s8, size_t l, size_t &bytes,
737 char32_t &cp) {
738 if (l) {
739 auto b = static_cast<uint8_t>(s8[0]);
740 if ((b & 0x80) == 0) {
741 bytes = 1;
742 cp = b;
743 return true;
744 } else if ((b & 0xE0) == 0xC0) {
745 if (l >= 2) {
746 bytes = 2;
747 cp = ((static_cast<char32_t>(s8[0] & 0x1F)) << 6) |
748 (static_cast<char32_t>(s8[1] & 0x3F));
749 return true;
750 }
751 } else if ((b & 0xF0) == 0xE0) {
752 if (l >= 3) {
753 bytes = 3;
754 cp = ((static_cast<char32_t>(s8[0] & 0x0F)) << 12) |
755 ((static_cast<char32_t>(s8[1] & 0x3F)) << 6) |
756 (static_cast<char32_t>(s8[2] & 0x3F));
757 return true;
758 }
759 } else if ((b & 0xF8) == 0xF0) {
760 if (l >= 4) {
761 bytes = 4;
762 cp = ((static_cast<char32_t>(s8[0] & 0x07)) << 18) |
763 ((static_cast<char32_t>(s8[1] & 0x3F)) << 12) |
764 ((static_cast<char32_t>(s8[2] & 0x3F)) << 6) |
765 (static_cast<char32_t>(s8[3] & 0x3F));
766 return true;
767 }
768 }
769 }
770 return false;
771}
772
773inline size_t decode_codepoint(const char *s8, size_t l, char32_t &out) {
774 size_t bytes;
775 if (decode_codepoint(s8, l, bytes, out)) {
776 return bytes;
777 }
778 return 0;
779}
780
781inline char32_t decode_codepoint(const char *s8, size_t l) {
782 char32_t out = 0;
783 decode_codepoint(s8, l, out);
784 return out;
785}
786
787inline std::u32string decode(const char *s8, size_t l) {
788 std::u32string out;
789 size_t i = 0;
790 while (i < l) {
791 auto beg = i++;
792 while (i < l && (s8[i] & 0xc0) == 0x80) {
793 i++;
794 }
795 out += decode_codepoint(&s8[beg], (i - beg));
796 }
797 return out;
798}
799
800/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
801 * resolve_escape_sequence
802 *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
803
804inline bool is_hex(char c, int& v) {
805 if ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
806 v = c - '0';
807 return true;
808 } else if ('a' <= c && c <= 'f') {
809 v = c - 'a' + 10;
810 return true;
811 } else if ('A' <= c && c <= 'F') {
812 v = c - 'A' + 10;
813 return true;
814 }
815 return false;
816}
817
818inline bool is_digit(char c, int& v) {
819 if ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
820 v = c - '0';
821 return true;
822 }
823 return false;
824}
825
826inline std::pair<int, size_t> parse_hex_number(const char* s, size_t n, size_t i) {
827 int ret = 0;
828 int val;
829 while (i < n && is_hex(s[i], val)) {
830 ret = static_cast<int>(ret * 16 + val);
831 i++;
832 }
833 return std::make_pair(ret, i);
834}
835
836inline std::pair<int, size_t> parse_octal_number(const char* s, size_t n, size_t i) {
837 int ret = 0;
838 int val;
839 while (i < n && is_digit(s[i], val)) {
840 ret = static_cast<int>(ret * 8 + val);
841 i++;
842 }
843 return std::make_pair(ret, i);
844}
845
846inline std::string resolve_escape_sequence(const char* s, size_t n) {
847 std::string r;
848 r.reserve(n);
849
850 size_t i = 0;
851 while (i < n) {
852 auto ch = s[i];
853 if (ch == '\\') {
854 i++;
855 switch (s[i]) {
856 case 'n': r += '\n'; i++; break;
857 case 'r': r += '\r'; i++; break;
858 case 't': r += '\t'; i++; break;
859 case '\'': r += '\''; i++; break;
860 case '"': r += '"'; i++; break;
861 case '[': r += '['; i++; break;
862 case ']': r += ']'; i++; break;
863 case '\\': r += '\\'; i++; break;
864 case 'x':
865 case 'u': {
866 char32_t cp;
867 std::tie(cp, i) = parse_hex_number(s, n, i + 1);
868 r += encode_codepoint(cp);
869 break;
870 }
871 default: {
872 char32_t cp;
873 std::tie(cp, i) = parse_octal_number(s, n, i);
874 r += encode_codepoint(cp);
875 break;
876 }
877 }
878 } else {
879 r += ch;
880 i++;
881 }
882 }
883 return r;
884}
885
886/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
887 * PEG
888 *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
889
890/*
891* Line information utility function
892*/
893inline std::pair<size_t, size_t> line_info(const char* start, const char* cur) {
894 auto p = start;
895 auto col_ptr = p;
896 auto no = 1;
897
898 while (p < cur) {
899 if (*p == '\n') {
900 no++;
901 col_ptr = p + 1;
902 }
903 p++;
904 }
905
906 auto col = p - col_ptr + 1;
907
908 return std::make_pair(no, col);
909}
910
911/*
912* String tag
913*/
914#ifndef PEGLIB_NO_CONSTEXPR_SUPPORT
915inline constexpr unsigned int str2tag(const char* str, int h = 0) {
916 return !str[h] ? 5381 : (str2tag(str, h + 1) * 33) ^ static_cast<unsigned char>(str[h]);
917}
918
919namespace udl {
920
921inline constexpr unsigned int operator "" _(const char* s, size_t) {
922 return str2tag(s);
923}
924
925}
926#endif
927
928/*
929* Semantic values
930*/
931struct SemanticValues : protected std::vector<any>
932{
933 // Input text
934 const char* path;
935 const char* ss;
936
937 // Matched string
938 const char* c_str() const { return s_; }
939 size_t length() const { return n_; }
940
941 std::string str() const {
942 return std::string(s_, n_);
943 }
944
945 // Definition name
946 const std::string& name() const { return name_; }
947
948#ifndef PEGLIB_NO_CONSTEXPR_SUPPORT
949 std::vector<unsigned int> tags;
950#endif
951
952 // Line number and column at which the matched string is
953 std::pair<size_t, size_t> line_info() const {
954 return peg::line_info(ss, s_);
955 }
956
957 // Choice count
958 size_t choice_count() const { return choice_count_; }
959
960 // Choice number (0 based index)
961 size_t choice() const { return choice_; }
962
963 // Tokens
964 std::vector<std::pair<const char*, size_t>> tokens;
965
966 std::string token(size_t id = 0) const {
967 if (!tokens.empty()) {
968 assert(id < tokens.size());
969 const auto& tok = tokens[id];
970 return std::string(tok.first, tok.second);
971 }
972 return std::string(s_, n_);
973 }
974
975 // Transform the semantic value vector to another vector
976 template <typename T>
977 auto transform(size_t beg = 0, size_t end = static_cast<size_t>(-1)) const -> vector<T> {
978 return this->transform(beg, end, [](const any& v) { return v.get<T>(); });
979 }
980
981 SemanticValues() : s_(nullptr), n_(0), choice_count_(0), choice_(0) {}
982
983 using std::vector<any>::iterator;
984 using std::vector<any>::const_iterator;
985 using std::vector<any>::size;
986 using std::vector<any>::empty;
987 using std::vector<any>::assign;
988 using std::vector<any>::begin;
989 using std::vector<any>::end;
990 using std::vector<any>::rbegin;
991 using std::vector<any>::rend;
992 using std::vector<any>::operator[];
993 using std::vector<any>::at;
994 using std::vector<any>::resize;
995 using std::vector<any>::front;
996 using std::vector<any>::back;
997 using std::vector<any>::push_back;
998 using std::vector<any>::pop_back;
999 using std::vector<any>::insert;
1000 using std::vector<any>::erase;
1001 using std::vector<any>::clear;
1002 using std::vector<any>::swap;
1003 using std::vector<any>::emplace;
1004 using std::vector<any>::emplace_back;
1005
1006private:
1007 friend class Context;
1008 friend class Sequence;
1009 friend class PrioritizedChoice;
1010 friend class Holder;
1011
1012 const char* s_;
1013 size_t n_;
1014 size_t choice_count_;
1015 size_t choice_;
1016 std::string name_;
1017
1018 template <typename F>
1019 auto transform(F f) const -> vector<typename std::remove_const<decltype(f(any()))>::type> {
1020 vector<typename std::remove_const<decltype(f(any()))>::type> r;
1021 for (const auto& v: *this) {
1022 r.emplace_back(f(v));
1023 }
1024 return r;
1025 }
1026
1027 template <typename F>
1028 auto transform(size_t beg, size_t end, F f) const -> vector<typename std::remove_const<decltype(f(any()))>::type> {
1029 vector<typename std::remove_const<decltype(f(any()))>::type> r;
1030 end = (std::min)(end, size());
1031 for (size_t i = beg; i < end; i++) {
1032 r.emplace_back(f((*this)[i]));
1033 }
1034 return r;
1035 }
1036
1037 void reset() {
1038 path = nullptr;
1039 ss = nullptr;
1040 tokens.clear();
1041
1042 s_ = nullptr;
1043 n_ = 0;
1044 choice_count_ = 0;
1045 choice_ = 0;
1046 }
1047};
1048
1049/*
1050 * Semantic action
1051 */
1052template <
1053 typename R, typename F,
1054 typename std::enable_if<std::is_void<R>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr,
1055 typename... Args>
1056any call(F fn, Args&&... args) {
1057 fn(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1058 return any();
1059}
1060
1061template <
1062 typename R, typename F,
1063 typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<typename std::remove_cv<R>::type, any>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr,
1064 typename... Args>
1065any call(F fn, Args&&... args) {
1066 return fn(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1067}
1068
1069template <
1070 typename R, typename F,
1071 typename std::enable_if<
1072 !std::is_void<R>::value &&
1073 !std::is_same<typename std::remove_cv<R>::type, any>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr,
1074 typename... Args>
1075any call(F fn, Args&&... args) {
1076 return any(fn(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
1077}
1078
1079class Action
1080{
1081public:
1082 Action() = default;
1083
1084 Action(const Action& rhs) : fn_(rhs.fn_) {}
1085
1086 template <typename F, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_pointer<F>::value && !std::is_same<F, std::nullptr_t>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr>
1087 Action(F fn) : fn_(make_adaptor(fn, &F::operator())) {}
1088
1089 template <typename F, typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<F>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr>
1090 Action(F fn) : fn_(make_adaptor(fn, fn)) {}
1091
1092 template <typename F, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<F, std::nullptr_t>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr>
1093 Action(F /*fn*/) {}
1094
1095 template <typename F, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_pointer<F>::value && !std::is_same<F, std::nullptr_t>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr>
1096 void operator=(F fn) {
1097 fn_ = make_adaptor(fn, &F::operator());
1098 }
1099
1100 template <typename F, typename std::enable_if<std::is_pointer<F>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr>
1101 void operator=(F fn) {
1102 fn_ = make_adaptor(fn, fn);
1103 }
1104
1105 template <typename F, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<F, std::nullptr_t>::value, std::nullptr_t>::type = nullptr>
1106 void operator=(F /*fn*/) {}
1107
1108 Action& operator=(const Action& rhs) = default;
1109
1110 operator bool() const {
1111 return bool(fn_);
1112 }
1113
1114 any operator()(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) const {
1115 return fn_(sv, dt);
1116 }
1117
1118private:
1119 template <typename R>
1120 struct TypeAdaptor_sv {
1121 TypeAdaptor_sv(std::function<R (SemanticValues& sv)> fn)
1122 : fn_(fn) {}
1123 any operator()(SemanticValues& sv, any& /*dt*/) {
1124 return call<R>(fn_, sv);
1125 }
1126 std::function<R (SemanticValues& sv)> fn_;
1127 };
1128
1129 template <typename R>
1130 struct TypeAdaptor_csv {
1131 TypeAdaptor_csv(std::function<R (const SemanticValues& sv)> fn)
1132 : fn_(fn) {}
1133 any operator()(SemanticValues& sv, any& /*dt*/) {
1134 return call<R>(fn_, sv);
1135 }
1136 std::function<R (const SemanticValues& sv)> fn_;
1137 };
1138
1139 template <typename R>
1140 struct TypeAdaptor_sv_dt {
1141 TypeAdaptor_sv_dt(std::function<R (SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> fn)
1142 : fn_(fn) {}
1143 any operator()(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) {
1144 return call<R>(fn_, sv, dt);
1145 }
1146 std::function<R (SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> fn_;
1147 };
1148
1149 template <typename R>
1150 struct TypeAdaptor_csv_dt {
1151 TypeAdaptor_csv_dt(std::function<R (const SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> fn)
1152 : fn_(fn) {}
1153 any operator()(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) {
1154 return call<R>(fn_, sv, dt);
1155 }
1156 std::function<R (const SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> fn_;
1157 };
1158
1159 typedef std::function<any (SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> Fty;
1160
1161 template<typename F, typename R>
1162 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(SemanticValues& sv) const) {
1163 return TypeAdaptor_sv<R>(fn);
1164 }
1165
1166 template<typename F, typename R>
1167 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(const SemanticValues& sv) const) {
1168 return TypeAdaptor_csv<R>(fn);
1169 }
1170
1171 template<typename F, typename R>
1172 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(SemanticValues& sv)) {
1173 return TypeAdaptor_sv<R>(fn);
1174 }
1175
1176 template<typename F, typename R>
1177 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(const SemanticValues& sv)) {
1178 return TypeAdaptor_csv<R>(fn);
1179 }
1180
1181 template<typename F, typename R>
1182 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (* /*mf*/)(SemanticValues& sv)) {
1183 return TypeAdaptor_sv<R>(fn);
1184 }
1185
1186 template<typename F, typename R>
1187 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (* /*mf*/)(const SemanticValues& sv)) {
1188 return TypeAdaptor_csv<R>(fn);
1189 }
1190
1191 template<typename F, typename R>
1192 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) const) {
1193 return TypeAdaptor_sv_dt<R>(fn);
1194 }
1195
1196 template<typename F, typename R>
1197 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(const SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) const) {
1198 return TypeAdaptor_csv_dt<R>(fn);
1199 }
1200
1201 template<typename F, typename R>
1202 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)) {
1203 return TypeAdaptor_sv_dt<R>(fn);
1204 }
1205
1206 template<typename F, typename R>
1207 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R (F::* /*mf*/)(const SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)) {
1208 return TypeAdaptor_csv_dt<R>(fn);
1209 }
1210
1211 template<typename F, typename R>
1212 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R(* /*mf*/)(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)) {
1213 return TypeAdaptor_sv_dt<R>(fn);
1214 }
1215
1216 template<typename F, typename R>
1217 Fty make_adaptor(F fn, R(* /*mf*/)(const SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)) {
1218 return TypeAdaptor_csv_dt<R>(fn);
1219 }
1220
1221 Fty fn_;
1222};
1223
1224/*
1225 * Semantic predicate
1226 */
1227// Note: 'parse_error' exception class should be be used in sematic action handlers to reject the rule.
1228struct parse_error {
1229 parse_error() = default;
1230 parse_error(const char* s) : s_(s) {}
1231 const char* what() const { return s_.empty() ? nullptr : s_.c_str(); }
1232private:
1233 std::string s_;
1234};
1235
1236/*
1237 * Result
1238 */
1239inline bool success(size_t len) {
1240 return len != static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1241}
1242
1243inline bool fail(size_t len) {
1244 return len == static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1245}
1246
1247/*
1248 * Context
1249 */
1250class Context;
1251class Ope;
1252class Definition;
1253
1254typedef std::function<void (const char* name, const char* s, size_t n, const SemanticValues& sv, const Context& c, const any& dt)> Tracer;
1255
1256class Context
1257{
1258public:
1259 const char* path;
1260 const char* s;
1261 const size_t l;
1262
1263 const char* error_pos;
1264 const char* message_pos;
1265 std::string message; // TODO: should be `int`.
1266
1267 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<SemanticValues>> value_stack;
1268 size_t value_stack_size;
1269 std::vector<std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>> args_stack;
1270
1271 size_t nest_level;
1272
1273 bool in_token;
1274
1275 std::shared_ptr<Ope> whitespaceOpe;
1276 bool in_whitespace;
1277
1278 std::shared_ptr<Ope> wordOpe;
1279
1280 std::vector<std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string>> capture_scope_stack;
1281
1282 const size_t def_count;
1283 const bool enablePackratParsing;
1284 std::vector<bool> cache_registered;
1285 std::vector<bool> cache_success;
1286
1287 std::map<std::pair<size_t, size_t>, std::tuple<size_t, any>> cache_values;
1288
1289 std::function<void (const char*, const char*, size_t, const SemanticValues&, const Context&, const any&)> tracer;
1290
1291 Context(
1292 const char* a_path,
1293 const char* a_s,
1294 size_t a_l,
1295 size_t a_def_count,
1296 std::shared_ptr<Ope> a_whitespaceOpe,
1297 std::shared_ptr<Ope> a_wordOpe,
1298 bool a_enablePackratParsing,
1299 Tracer a_tracer)
1300 : path(a_path)
1301 , s(a_s)
1302 , l(a_l)
1303 , error_pos(nullptr)
1304 , message_pos(nullptr)
1305 , value_stack_size(0)
1306 , nest_level(0)
1307 , in_token(false)
1308 , whitespaceOpe(a_whitespaceOpe)
1309 , in_whitespace(false)
1310 , wordOpe(a_wordOpe)
1311 , def_count(a_def_count)
1312 , enablePackratParsing(a_enablePackratParsing)
1313 , cache_registered(enablePackratParsing ? def_count * (l + 1) : 0)
1314 , cache_success(enablePackratParsing ? def_count * (l + 1) : 0)
1315 , tracer(a_tracer)
1316 {
1317 args_stack.resize(1);
1318 capture_scope_stack.resize(1);
1319 }
1320
1321 template <typename T>
1322 void packrat(const char* a_s, size_t def_id, size_t& len, any& val, T fn) {
1323 if (!enablePackratParsing) {
1324 fn(val);
1325 return;
1326 }
1327
1328 auto col = a_s - s;
1329 auto idx = def_count * static_cast<size_t>(col) + def_id;
1330
1331 if (cache_registered[idx]) {
1332 if (cache_success[idx]) {
1333 auto key = std::make_pair(col, def_id);
1334 std::tie(len, val) = cache_values[key];
1335 return;
1336 } else {
1337 len = static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1338 return;
1339 }
1340 } else {
1341 fn(val);
1342 cache_registered[idx] = true;
1343 cache_success[idx] = success(len);
1344 if (success(len)) {
1345 auto key = std::make_pair(col, def_id);
1346 cache_values[key] = std::make_pair(len, val);
1347 }
1348 return;
1349 }
1350 }
1351
1352 SemanticValues& push() {
1353 assert(value_stack_size <= value_stack.size());
1354 if (value_stack_size == value_stack.size()) {
1355 value_stack.emplace_back(std::make_shared<SemanticValues>());
1356 }
1357 auto& sv = *value_stack[value_stack_size++];
1358 if (!sv.empty()) {
1359 sv.clear();
1360 sv.tags.clear();
1361 }
1362 sv.reset();
1363 sv.path = path;
1364 sv.ss = s;
1365 return sv;
1366 }
1367
1368 void pop() {
1369 value_stack_size--;
1370 }
1371
1372 void push_args(const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& args) {
1373 args_stack.push_back(args);
1374 }
1375
1376 void pop_args() {
1377 args_stack.pop_back();
1378 }
1379
1380 const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& top_args() const {
1381 return args_stack[args_stack.size() - 1];
1382 }
1383
1384 void push_capture_scope() {
1385 capture_scope_stack.resize(capture_scope_stack.size() + 1);
1386 }
1387
1388 void pop_capture_scope() {
1389 capture_scope_stack.pop_back();
1390 }
1391
1392 void shift_capture_values() {
1393 assert(capture_scope_stack.size() >= 2);
1394 auto it = capture_scope_stack.rbegin();
1395 auto it_prev = it + 1;
1396 for (const auto& kv: *it) {
1397 (*it_prev)[kv.first] = kv.second;
1398 }
1399 }
1400
1401 void set_error_pos(const char* a_s) {
1402 if (error_pos < a_s) error_pos = a_s;
1403 }
1404
1405 void trace(const char* name, const char* a_s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) const {
1406 if (tracer) tracer(name, a_s, n, sv, *this, dt);
1407 }
1408};
1409
1410/*
1411 * Parser operators
1412 */
1413class Ope
1414{
1415public:
1416 struct Visitor;
1417
1418 virtual ~Ope() {}
1419 virtual size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const = 0;
1420 virtual void accept(Visitor& v) = 0;
1421};
1422
1423class Sequence : public Ope
1424{
1425public:
1426 Sequence(const Sequence& rhs) : opes_(rhs.opes_) {}
1427
1428#if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1900 // Less than Visual Studio 2015
1429 // NOTE: Compiler Error C2797 on Visual Studio 2013
1430 // "The C++ compiler in Visual Studio does not implement list
1431 // initialization inside either a member initializer list or a non-static
1432 // data member initializer. Before Visual Studio 2013 Update 3, this was
1433 // silently converted to a function call, which could lead to bad code
1434 // generation. Visual Studio 2013 Update 3 reports this as an error."
1435 template <typename... Args>
1436 Sequence(const Args& ...args) {
1437 opes_ = std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>{ static_cast<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>(args)... };
1438 }
1439#else
1440 template <typename... Args>
1441 Sequence(const Args& ...args) : opes_{ static_cast<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>(args)... } {}
1442#endif
1443
1444 Sequence(const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& opes) : opes_(opes) {}
1445 Sequence(std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>&& opes) : opes_(opes) {}
1446
1447 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1448 c.trace("Sequence", s, n, sv, dt);
1449 auto& chldsv = c.push();
1450 size_t i = 0;
1451 for (const auto& ope : opes_) {
1452 c.nest_level++;
1453 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() { c.nest_level--; });
1454 const auto& rule = *ope;
1455 auto len = rule.parse(s + i, n - i, chldsv, c, dt);
1456 if (fail(len)) {
1457 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1458 }
1459 i += len;
1460 }
1461 sv.insert(sv.end(), chldsv.begin(), chldsv.end());
1462 sv.tags.insert(sv.tags.end(), chldsv.tags.begin(), chldsv.tags.end());
1463 sv.s_ = chldsv.c_str();
1464 sv.n_ = chldsv.length();
1465 sv.tokens.insert(sv.tokens.end(), chldsv.tokens.begin(), chldsv.tokens.end());
1466 return i;
1467 }
1468
1469 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1470
1471 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>> opes_;
1472};
1473
1474class PrioritizedChoice : public Ope
1475{
1476public:
1477#if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1900 // Less than Visual Studio 2015
1478 // NOTE: Compiler Error C2797 on Visual Studio 2013
1479 // "The C++ compiler in Visual Studio does not implement list
1480 // initialization inside either a member initializer list or a non-static
1481 // data member initializer. Before Visual Studio 2013 Update 3, this was
1482 // silently converted to a function call, which could lead to bad code
1483 // generation. Visual Studio 2013 Update 3 reports this as an error."
1484 template <typename... Args>
1485 PrioritizedChoice(const Args& ...args) {
1486 opes_ = std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>{ static_cast<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>(args)... };
1487 }
1488#else
1489 template <typename... Args>
1490 PrioritizedChoice(const Args& ...args) : opes_{ static_cast<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>(args)... } {}
1491#endif
1492
1493 PrioritizedChoice(const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& opes) : opes_(opes) {}
1494 PrioritizedChoice(std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>&& opes) : opes_(opes) {}
1495
1496 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1497 c.trace("PrioritizedChoice", s, n, sv, dt);
1498 size_t id = 0;
1499 for (const auto& ope : opes_) {
1500 c.nest_level++;
1501 auto& chldsv = c.push();
1502 c.push_capture_scope();
1503 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1504 c.nest_level--;
1505 c.pop();
1506 c.pop_capture_scope();
1507 });
1508 const auto& rule = *ope;
1509 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, chldsv, c, dt);
1510 if (success(len)) {
1511 sv.insert(sv.end(), chldsv.begin(), chldsv.end());
1512 sv.tags.insert(sv.tags.end(), chldsv.tags.begin(), chldsv.tags.end());
1513 sv.s_ = chldsv.c_str();
1514 sv.n_ = chldsv.length();
1515 sv.choice_count_ = opes_.size();
1516 sv.choice_ = id;
1517 sv.tokens.insert(sv.tokens.end(), chldsv.tokens.begin(), chldsv.tokens.end());
1518
1519 c.shift_capture_values();
1520 return len;
1521 }
1522 id++;
1523 }
1524 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1525 }
1526
1527 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1528
1529 size_t size() const { return opes_.size(); }
1530
1531 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>> opes_;
1532};
1533
1534class ZeroOrMore : public Ope
1535{
1536public:
1537 ZeroOrMore(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1538
1539 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1540 c.trace("ZeroOrMore", s, n, sv, dt);
1541 auto save_error_pos = c.error_pos;
1542 size_t i = 0;
1543 while (n - i > 0) {
1544 c.nest_level++;
1545 c.push_capture_scope();
1546 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1547 c.nest_level--;
1548 c.pop_capture_scope();
1549 });
1550 auto save_sv_size = sv.size();
1551 auto save_tok_size = sv.tokens.size();
1552 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1553 auto len = rule.parse(s + i, n - i, sv, c, dt);
1554 if (success(len)) {
1555 c.shift_capture_values();
1556 } else {
1557 if (sv.size() != save_sv_size) {
1558 sv.erase(sv.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_sv_size));
1559 sv.tags.erase(sv.tags.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_sv_size));
1560 }
1561 if (sv.tokens.size() != save_tok_size) {
1562 sv.tokens.erase(sv.tokens.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_tok_size));
1563 }
1564 c.error_pos = save_error_pos;
1565 break;
1566 }
1567 i += len;
1568 }
1569 return i;
1570 }
1571
1572 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1573
1574 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1575};
1576
1577class OneOrMore : public Ope
1578{
1579public:
1580 OneOrMore(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1581
1582 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1583 c.trace("OneOrMore", s, n, sv, dt);
1584 size_t len = 0;
1585 {
1586 c.nest_level++;
1587 c.push_capture_scope();
1588 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1589 c.nest_level--;
1590 c.pop_capture_scope();
1591 });
1592 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1593 len = rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
1594 if (success(len)) {
1595 c.shift_capture_values();
1596 } else {
1597 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1598 }
1599 }
1600 auto save_error_pos = c.error_pos;
1601 auto i = len;
1602 while (n - i > 0) {
1603 c.nest_level++;
1604 c.push_capture_scope();
1605 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1606 c.nest_level--;
1607 c.pop_capture_scope();
1608 });
1609 auto save_sv_size = sv.size();
1610 auto save_tok_size = sv.tokens.size();
1611 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1612 len = rule.parse(s + i, n - i, sv, c, dt);
1613 if (success(len)) {
1614 c.shift_capture_values();
1615 } else {
1616 if (sv.size() != save_sv_size) {
1617 sv.erase(sv.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_sv_size));
1618 sv.tags.erase(sv.tags.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_sv_size));
1619 }
1620 if (sv.tokens.size() != save_tok_size) {
1621 sv.tokens.erase(sv.tokens.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_tok_size));
1622 }
1623 c.error_pos = save_error_pos;
1624 break;
1625 }
1626 i += len;
1627 }
1628 return i;
1629 }
1630
1631 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1632
1633 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1634};
1635
1636class Option : public Ope
1637{
1638public:
1639 Option(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1640
1641 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1642 c.trace("Option", s, n, sv, dt);
1643 auto save_error_pos = c.error_pos;
1644 c.nest_level++;
1645 auto save_sv_size = sv.size();
1646 auto save_tok_size = sv.tokens.size();
1647 c.push_capture_scope();
1648 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1649 c.nest_level--;
1650 c.pop_capture_scope();
1651 });
1652 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1653 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
1654 if (success(len)) {
1655 c.shift_capture_values();
1656 return len;
1657 } else {
1658 if (sv.size() != save_sv_size) {
1659 sv.erase(sv.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_sv_size));
1660 sv.tags.erase(sv.tags.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_sv_size));
1661 }
1662 if (sv.tokens.size() != save_tok_size) {
1663 sv.tokens.erase(sv.tokens.begin() + static_cast<std::ptrdiff_t>(save_tok_size));
1664 }
1665 c.error_pos = save_error_pos;
1666 return 0;
1667 }
1668 }
1669
1670 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1671
1672 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1673};
1674
1675class AndPredicate : public Ope
1676{
1677public:
1678 AndPredicate(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1679
1680 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1681 c.trace("AndPredicate", s, n, sv, dt);
1682 c.nest_level++;
1683 auto& chldsv = c.push();
1684 c.push_capture_scope();
1685 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1686 c.nest_level--;
1687 c.pop();
1688 c.pop_capture_scope();
1689 });
1690 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1691 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, chldsv, c, dt);
1692 if (success(len)) {
1693 return 0;
1694 } else {
1695 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1696 }
1697 }
1698
1699 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1700
1701 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1702};
1703
1704class NotPredicate : public Ope
1705{
1706public:
1707 NotPredicate(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1708
1709 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1710 c.trace("NotPredicate", s, n, sv, dt);
1711 auto save_error_pos = c.error_pos;
1712 c.nest_level++;
1713 auto& chldsv = c.push();
1714 c.push_capture_scope();
1715 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1716 c.nest_level--;
1717 c.pop();
1718 c.pop_capture_scope();
1719 });
1720 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1721 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, chldsv, c, dt);
1722 if (success(len)) {
1723 c.set_error_pos(s);
1724 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1725 } else {
1726 c.error_pos = save_error_pos;
1727 return 0;
1728 }
1729 }
1730
1731 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1732
1733 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1734};
1735
1736class LiteralString : public Ope
1737 , public std::enable_shared_from_this<LiteralString>
1738{
1739public:
1740 LiteralString(const std::string& s, bool ignore_case)
1741 : lit_(s)
1742 , ignore_case_(ignore_case)
1743 , init_is_word_(false)
1744 , is_word_(false)
1745 {}
1746
1747 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override;
1748
1749 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1750
1751 std::string lit_;
1752 bool ignore_case_;
1753 mutable bool init_is_word_;
1754 mutable bool is_word_;
1755};
1756
1757class CharacterClass : public Ope
1758 , public std::enable_shared_from_this<CharacterClass>
1759{
1760public:
1761 CharacterClass(const std::string& s) {
1762 auto chars = decode(s.c_str(), s.length());
1763 auto i = 0u;
1764 while (i < chars.size()) {
1765 if (i + 2 < chars.size() && chars[i + 1] == '-') {
1766 auto cp1 = chars[i];
1767 auto cp2 = chars[i + 2];
1768 ranges_.emplace_back(std::make_pair(cp1, cp2));
1769 i += 3;
1770 } else {
1771 auto cp = chars[i];
1772 ranges_.emplace_back(std::make_pair(cp, cp));
1773 i += 1;
1774 }
1775 }
1776 }
1777
1778 CharacterClass(const std::vector<std::pair<char32_t, char32_t>>& ranges) : ranges_(ranges) {}
1779
1780 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1781 c.trace("CharacterClass", s, n, sv, dt);
1782
1783 if (n < 1) {
1784 c.set_error_pos(s);
1785 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1786 }
1787
1788 char32_t cp = '\0';
1789 auto len = decode_codepoint(s, n, cp);
1790
1791 if (!ranges_.empty()) {
1792 for (const auto& range: ranges_) {
1793 if (range.first <= cp && cp <= range.second) {
1794 return len;
1795 }
1796 }
1797 }
1798
1799 c.set_error_pos(s);
1800 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1801 }
1802
1803 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1804
1805 std::vector<std::pair<char32_t, char32_t>> ranges_;
1806};
1807
1808class Character : public Ope
1809 , public std::enable_shared_from_this<Character>
1810{
1811public:
1812 Character(char ch) : ch_(ch) {}
1813
1814 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1815 c.trace("Character", s, n, sv, dt);
1816 if (n < 1 || s[0] != ch_) {
1817 c.set_error_pos(s);
1818 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1819 }
1820 return 1;
1821 }
1822
1823 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1824
1825 char ch_;
1826};
1827
1828class AnyCharacter : public Ope
1829 , public std::enable_shared_from_this<AnyCharacter>
1830{
1831public:
1832 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1833 c.trace("AnyCharacter", s, n, sv, dt);
1834 auto len = codepoint_length(s, n);
1835 if (len < 1) {
1836 c.set_error_pos(s);
1837 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
1838 }
1839 return len;
1840 }
1841
1842 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1843};
1844
1845class CaptureScope : public Ope
1846{
1847public:
1848 CaptureScope(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope)
1849 : ope_(ope) {}
1850
1851 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1852 c.push_capture_scope();
1853 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1854 c.pop_capture_scope();
1855 });
1856 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1857 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
1858 return len;
1859 }
1860
1861 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1862
1863 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1864};
1865
1866class Capture : public Ope
1867{
1868public:
1869 typedef std::function<void (const char* s, size_t n, Context& c)> MatchAction;
1870
1871 Capture(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope, MatchAction ma)
1872 : ope_(ope), match_action_(ma) {}
1873
1874 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1875 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1876 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
1877 if (success(len) && match_action_) {
1878 match_action_(s, len, c);
1879 }
1880 return len;
1881 }
1882
1883 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1884
1885 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1886 MatchAction match_action_;
1887};
1888
1889class TokenBoundary : public Ope
1890{
1891public:
1892 TokenBoundary(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1893
1894 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override;
1895
1896 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1897
1898 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1899};
1900
1901class Ignore : public Ope
1902{
1903public:
1904 Ignore(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
1905
1906 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& /*sv*/, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1907 const auto& rule = *ope_;
1908 auto& chldsv = c.push();
1909 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
1910 c.pop();
1911 });
1912 return rule.parse(s, n, chldsv, c, dt);
1913 }
1914
1915 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1916
1917 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1918};
1919
1920typedef std::function<size_t (const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> Parser;
1921
1922class User : public Ope
1923{
1924public:
1925 User(Parser fn) : fn_(fn) {}
1926 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1927 c.trace("User", s, n, sv, dt);
1928 assert(fn_);
1929 return fn_(s, n, sv, dt);
1930 }
1931 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1932 std::function<size_t (const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> fn_;
1933};
1934
1935class WeakHolder : public Ope
1936{
1937public:
1938 WeakHolder(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : weak_(ope) {}
1939
1940 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
1941 auto ope = weak_.lock();
1942 assert(ope);
1943 const auto& rule = *ope;
1944 return rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
1945 }
1946
1947 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1948
1949 std::weak_ptr<Ope> weak_;
1950};
1951
1952class Holder : public Ope
1953{
1954public:
1955 Holder(Definition* outer)
1956 : outer_(outer) {}
1957
1958 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override;
1959
1960 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1961
1962 any reduce(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) const;
1963
1964 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
1965 Definition* outer_;
1966
1967 friend class Definition;
1968};
1969
1970typedef std::unordered_map<std::string, Definition> Grammar;
1971
1972class Reference : public Ope
1973 , public std::enable_shared_from_this<Reference>
1974{
1975public:
1976 Reference(
1977 const Grammar& grammar,
1978 const std::string& name,
1979 const char* s,
1980 bool is_macro,
1981 const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& args)
1982 : grammar_(grammar)
1983 , name_(name)
1984 , s_(s)
1985 , is_macro_(is_macro)
1986 , args_(args)
1987 , rule_(nullptr)
1988 , iarg_(0)
1989 {}
1990
1991 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override;
1992
1993 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
1994
1995 std::shared_ptr<Ope> get_core_operator() const;
1996
1997 const Grammar& grammar_;
1998 const std::string name_;
1999 const char* s_;
2000
2001 const bool is_macro_;
2002 const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>> args_;
2003
2004 Definition* rule_;
2005 size_t iarg_;
2006};
2007
2008class Whitespace : public Ope
2009{
2010public:
2011 Whitespace(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) : ope_(ope) {}
2012
2013 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override {
2014 if (c.in_whitespace) {
2015 return 0;
2016 }
2017 c.in_whitespace = true;
2018 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() { c.in_whitespace = false; });
2019 const auto& rule = *ope_;
2020 return rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
2021 }
2022
2023 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
2024
2025 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope_;
2026};
2027
2028class BackReference : public Ope
2029{
2030public:
2031 BackReference(const std::string& name) : name_(name) {}
2032
2033 size_t parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const override;
2034
2035 void accept(Visitor& v) override;
2036
2037 std::string name_;
2038};
2039
2040/*
2041 * Factories
2042 */
2043template <typename... Args>
2044std::shared_ptr<Ope> seq(Args&& ...args) {
2045 return std::make_shared<Sequence>(static_cast<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>(args)...);
2046}
2047
2048template <typename... Args>
2049std::shared_ptr<Ope> cho(Args&& ...args) {
2050 return std::make_shared<PrioritizedChoice>(static_cast<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>(args)...);
2051}
2052
2053inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> zom(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2054 return std::make_shared<ZeroOrMore>(ope);
2055}
2056
2057inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> oom(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2058 return std::make_shared<OneOrMore>(ope);
2059}
2060
2061inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> opt(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2062 return std::make_shared<Option>(ope);
2063}
2064
2065inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> apd(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2066 return std::make_shared<AndPredicate>(ope);
2067}
2068
2069inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> npd(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2070 return std::make_shared<NotPredicate>(ope);
2071}
2072
2073inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> lit(const std::string& s) {
2074 return std::make_shared<LiteralString>(s, false);
2075}
2076
2077inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> liti(const std::string& s) {
2078 return std::make_shared<LiteralString>(s, true);
2079}
2080
2081inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> cls(const std::string& s) {
2082 return std::make_shared<CharacterClass>(s);
2083}
2084
2085inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> cls(const std::vector<std::pair<char32_t, char32_t>>& ranges) {
2086 return std::make_shared<CharacterClass>(ranges);
2087}
2088
2089inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> chr(char dt) {
2090 return std::make_shared<Character>(dt);
2091}
2092
2093inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> dot() {
2094 return std::make_shared<AnyCharacter>();
2095}
2096
2097inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> csc(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2098 return std::make_shared<CaptureScope>(ope);
2099}
2100
2101inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> cap(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope, Capture::MatchAction ma) {
2102 return std::make_shared<Capture>(ope, ma);
2103}
2104
2105inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> tok(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2106 return std::make_shared<TokenBoundary>(ope);
2107}
2108
2109inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> ign(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2110 return std::make_shared<Ignore>(ope);
2111}
2112
2113inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> usr(std::function<size_t (const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, any& dt)> fn) {
2114 return std::make_shared<User>(fn);
2115}
2116
2117inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> ref(const Grammar& grammar, const std::string& name, const char* s, bool is_macro, const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& args) {
2118 return std::make_shared<Reference>(grammar, name, s, is_macro, args);
2119}
2120
2121inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> wsp(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2122 return std::make_shared<Whitespace>(std::make_shared<Ignore>(ope));
2123}
2124
2125inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> bkr(const std::string& name) {
2126 return std::make_shared<BackReference>(name);
2127}
2128
2129/*
2130 * Visitor
2131 */
2132struct Ope::Visitor
2133{
2134 virtual ~Visitor() {}
2135 virtual void visit(Sequence& /*ope*/) {}
2136 virtual void visit(PrioritizedChoice& /*ope*/) {}
2137 virtual void visit(ZeroOrMore& /*ope*/) {}
2138 virtual void visit(OneOrMore& /*ope*/) {}
2139 virtual void visit(Option& /*ope*/) {}
2140 virtual void visit(AndPredicate& /*ope*/) {}
2141 virtual void visit(NotPredicate& /*ope*/) {}
2142 virtual void visit(LiteralString& /*ope*/) {}
2143 virtual void visit(CharacterClass& /*ope*/) {}
2144 virtual void visit(Character& /*ope*/) {}
2145 virtual void visit(AnyCharacter& /*ope*/) {}
2146 virtual void visit(CaptureScope& /*ope*/) {}
2147 virtual void visit(Capture& /*ope*/) {}
2148 virtual void visit(TokenBoundary& /*ope*/) {}
2149 virtual void visit(Ignore& /*ope*/) {}
2150 virtual void visit(User& /*ope*/) {}
2151 virtual void visit(WeakHolder& /*ope*/) {}
2152 virtual void visit(Holder& /*ope*/) {}
2153 virtual void visit(Reference& /*ope*/) {}
2154 virtual void visit(Whitespace& /*ope*/) {}
2155 virtual void visit(BackReference& /*ope*/) {}
2156};
2157
2158struct AssignIDToDefinition : public Ope::Visitor
2159{
2160 void visit(Sequence& ope) override {
2161 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2162 op->accept(*this);
2163 }
2164 }
2165 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2166 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2167 op->accept(*this);
2168 }
2169 }
2170 void visit(ZeroOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2171 void visit(OneOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2172 void visit(Option& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2173 void visit(AndPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2174 void visit(NotPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2175 void visit(CaptureScope& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2176 void visit(Capture& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2177 void visit(TokenBoundary& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2178 void visit(Ignore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2179 void visit(WeakHolder& ope) override { ope.weak_.lock()->accept(*this); }
2180 void visit(Holder& ope) override;
2181 void visit(Reference& ope) override;
2182 void visit(Whitespace& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2183
2184 std::unordered_map<void*, size_t> ids;
2185};
2186
2187struct IsLiteralToken : public Ope::Visitor
2188{
2189 IsLiteralToken() : result_(false) {}
2190
2191 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2192 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2193 if (!IsLiteralToken::check(*op)) {
2194 return;
2195 }
2196 }
2197 result_ = true;
2198 }
2199
2200 void visit(LiteralString& /*ope*/) override {
2201 result_ = true;
2202 }
2203
2204 static bool check(Ope& ope) {
2205 IsLiteralToken vis;
2206 ope.accept(vis);
2207 return vis.result_;
2208 }
2209
2210private:
2211 bool result_;
2212};
2213
2214struct TokenChecker : public Ope::Visitor
2215{
2216 TokenChecker() : has_token_boundary_(false), has_rule_(false) {}
2217
2218 void visit(Sequence& ope) override {
2219 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2220 op->accept(*this);
2221 }
2222 }
2223 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2224 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2225 op->accept(*this);
2226 }
2227 }
2228 void visit(ZeroOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2229 void visit(OneOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2230 void visit(Option& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2231 void visit(CaptureScope& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2232 void visit(Capture& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2233 void visit(TokenBoundary& /*ope*/) override { has_token_boundary_ = true; }
2234 void visit(Ignore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2235 void visit(WeakHolder& ope) override { ope.weak_.lock()->accept(*this); }
2236 void visit(Reference& ope) override;
2237 void visit(Whitespace& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2238
2239 static bool is_token(Ope& ope) {
2240 if (IsLiteralToken::check(ope)) {
2241 return true;
2242 }
2243
2244 TokenChecker vis;
2245 ope.accept(vis);
2246 return vis.has_token_boundary_ || !vis.has_rule_;
2247 }
2248
2249private:
2250 bool has_token_boundary_;
2251 bool has_rule_;
2252};
2253
2254struct DetectLeftRecursion : public Ope::Visitor {
2255 DetectLeftRecursion(const std::string& name)
2256 : error_s(nullptr), name_(name), done_(false) {}
2257
2258 void visit(Sequence& ope) override {
2259 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2260 op->accept(*this);
2261 if (done_) {
2262 break;
2263 } else if (error_s) {
2264 done_ = true;
2265 break;
2266 }
2267 }
2268 }
2269 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2270 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2271 op->accept(*this);
2272 if (error_s) {
2273 done_ = true;
2274 break;
2275 }
2276 }
2277 }
2278 void visit(ZeroOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); done_ = false; }
2279 void visit(OneOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); done_ = true; }
2280 void visit(Option& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); done_ = false; }
2281 void visit(AndPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); done_ = false; }
2282 void visit(NotPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); done_ = false; }
2283 void visit(LiteralString& ope) override { done_ = !ope.lit_.empty(); }
2284 void visit(CharacterClass& /*ope*/) override { done_ = true; }
2285 void visit(Character& /*ope*/) override { done_ = true; }
2286 void visit(AnyCharacter& /*ope*/) override { done_ = true; }
2287 void visit(CaptureScope& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2288 void visit(Capture& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2289 void visit(TokenBoundary& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2290 void visit(Ignore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2291 void visit(User& /*ope*/) override { done_ = true; }
2292 void visit(WeakHolder& ope) override { ope.weak_.lock()->accept(*this); }
2293 void visit(Holder& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2294 void visit(Reference& ope) override;
2295 void visit(Whitespace& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2296 void visit(BackReference& /*ope*/) override { done_ = true; }
2297
2298 const char* error_s;
2299
2300private:
2301 std::string name_;
2302 std::set<std::string> refs_;
2303 bool done_;
2304};
2305
2306struct ReferenceChecker : public Ope::Visitor {
2307 ReferenceChecker(
2308 const Grammar& grammar,
2309 const std::vector<std::string>& params)
2310 : grammar_(grammar), params_(params) {}
2311
2312 void visit(Sequence& ope) override {
2313 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2314 op->accept(*this);
2315 }
2316 }
2317 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2318 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2319 op->accept(*this);
2320 }
2321 }
2322 void visit(ZeroOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2323 void visit(OneOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2324 void visit(Option& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2325 void visit(AndPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2326 void visit(NotPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2327 void visit(CaptureScope& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2328 void visit(Capture& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2329 void visit(TokenBoundary& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2330 void visit(Ignore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2331 void visit(WeakHolder& ope) override { ope.weak_.lock()->accept(*this); }
2332 void visit(Holder& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2333 void visit(Reference& ope) override;
2334 void visit(Whitespace& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2335
2336 std::unordered_map<std::string, const char*> error_s;
2337 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> error_message;
2338
2339private:
2340 const Grammar& grammar_;
2341 const std::vector<std::string>& params_;
2342};
2343
2344struct LinkReferences : public Ope::Visitor {
2345 LinkReferences(
2346 Grammar& grammar,
2347 const std::vector<std::string>& params)
2348 : grammar_(grammar), params_(params) {}
2349
2350 void visit(Sequence& ope) override {
2351 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2352 op->accept(*this);
2353 }
2354 }
2355 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2356 for (auto op: ope.opes_) {
2357 op->accept(*this);
2358 }
2359 }
2360 void visit(ZeroOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2361 void visit(OneOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2362 void visit(Option& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2363 void visit(AndPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2364 void visit(NotPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2365 void visit(CaptureScope& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2366 void visit(Capture& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2367 void visit(TokenBoundary& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2368 void visit(Ignore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2369 void visit(WeakHolder& ope) override { ope.weak_.lock()->accept(*this); }
2370 void visit(Holder& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2371 void visit(Reference& ope) override;
2372 void visit(Whitespace& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2373
2374private:
2375 Grammar& grammar_;
2376 const std::vector<std::string>& params_;
2377};
2378
2379struct FindReference : public Ope::Visitor {
2380 FindReference(
2381 const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& args,
2382 const std::vector<std::string>& params)
2383 : args_(args), params_(params) {}
2384
2385 void visit(Sequence& ope) override {
2386 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>> opes;
2387 for (auto o: ope.opes_) {
2388 o->accept(*this);
2389 opes.push_back(found_ope);
2390 }
2391 found_ope = std::make_shared<Sequence>(opes);
2392 }
2393 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& ope) override {
2394 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>> opes;
2395 for (auto o: ope.opes_) {
2396 o->accept(*this);
2397 opes.push_back(found_ope);
2398 }
2399 found_ope = std::make_shared<PrioritizedChoice>(opes);
2400 }
2401 void visit(ZeroOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = zom(found_ope); }
2402 void visit(OneOrMore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = oom(found_ope); }
2403 void visit(Option& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = opt(found_ope); }
2404 void visit(AndPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = apd(found_ope); }
2405 void visit(NotPredicate& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = npd(found_ope); }
2406 void visit(LiteralString& ope) override { found_ope = ope.shared_from_this(); }
2407 void visit(CharacterClass& ope) override { found_ope = ope.shared_from_this(); }
2408 void visit(Character& ope) override { found_ope = ope.shared_from_this(); }
2409 void visit(AnyCharacter& ope) override { found_ope = ope.shared_from_this(); }
2410 void visit(CaptureScope& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = csc(found_ope); }
2411 void visit(Capture& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = cap(found_ope, ope.match_action_); }
2412 void visit(TokenBoundary& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = tok(found_ope); }
2413 void visit(Ignore& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = ign(found_ope); }
2414 void visit(WeakHolder& ope) override { ope.weak_.lock()->accept(*this); }
2415 void visit(Holder& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); }
2416 void visit(Reference& ope) override;
2417 void visit(Whitespace& ope) override { ope.ope_->accept(*this); found_ope = wsp(found_ope); }
2418
2419 std::shared_ptr<Ope> found_ope;
2420
2421private:
2422 const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>>& args_;
2423 const std::vector<std::string>& params_;
2424};
2425
2426struct IsPrioritizedChoice : public Ope::Visitor
2427{
2428 IsPrioritizedChoice() : result_(false) {}
2429
2430 void visit(PrioritizedChoice& /*ope*/) override {
2431 result_ = true;
2432 }
2433
2434 static bool check(Ope& ope) {
2435 IsPrioritizedChoice vis;
2436 ope.accept(vis);
2437 return vis.result_;
2438 }
2439
2440private:
2441 bool result_;
2442};
2443
2444/*
2445 * Keywords
2446 */
2447static const char* WHITESPACE_DEFINITION_NAME = "%whitespace";
2448static const char* WORD_DEFINITION_NAME = "%word";
2449
2450/*
2451 * Definition
2452 */
2453class Definition
2454{
2455public:
2456 struct Result {
2457 bool ret;
2458 size_t len;
2459 const char* error_pos;
2460 const char* message_pos;
2461 const std::string message;
2462 };
2463
2464 Definition()
2465 : ignoreSemanticValue(false)
2466 , enablePackratParsing(false)
2467 , is_macro(false)
2468 , holder_(std::make_shared<Holder>(this))
2469 , is_token_(false) {}
2470
2471 Definition(const Definition& rhs)
2472 : name(rhs.name)
2473 , ignoreSemanticValue(false)
2474 , enablePackratParsing(false)
2475 , is_macro(false)
2476 , holder_(rhs.holder_)
2477 , is_token_(false)
2478 {
2479 holder_->outer_ = this;
2480 }
2481
2482 Definition(Definition&& rhs)
2483 : name(std::move(rhs.name))
2484 , ignoreSemanticValue(rhs.ignoreSemanticValue)
2485 , whitespaceOpe(rhs.whitespaceOpe)
2486 , wordOpe(rhs.wordOpe)
2487 , enablePackratParsing(rhs.enablePackratParsing)
2488 , is_macro(rhs.is_macro)
2489 , holder_(std::move(rhs.holder_))
2490 , is_token_(rhs.is_token_)
2491 {
2492 holder_->outer_ = this;
2493 }
2494
2495 Definition(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope)
2496 : ignoreSemanticValue(false)
2497 , enablePackratParsing(false)
2498 , is_macro(false)
2499 , holder_(std::make_shared<Holder>(this))
2500 , is_token_(false)
2501 {
2502 *this <= ope;
2503 }
2504
2505 operator std::shared_ptr<Ope>() {
2506 return std::make_shared<WeakHolder>(holder_);
2507 }
2508
2509 Definition& operator<=(const std::shared_ptr<Ope>& ope) {
2510 holder_->ope_ = ope;
2511 return *this;
2512 }
2513
2514 Result parse(const char* s, size_t n, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2515 SemanticValues sv;
2516 any dt;
2517 return parse_core(s, n, sv, dt, path);
2518 }
2519
2520 Result parse(const char* s, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2521 auto n = strlen(s);
2522 return parse(s, n, path);
2523 }
2524
2525 Result parse(const char* s, size_t n, any& dt, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2526 SemanticValues sv;
2527 return parse_core(s, n, sv, dt, path);
2528 }
2529
2530 Result parse(const char* s, any& dt, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2531 auto n = strlen(s);
2532 return parse(s, n, dt, path);
2533 }
2534
2535 template <typename T>
2536 Result parse_and_get_value(const char* s, size_t n, T& val, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2537 SemanticValues sv;
2538 any dt;
2539 auto r = parse_core(s, n, sv, dt, path);
2540 if (r.ret && !sv.empty() && !sv.front().is_undefined()) {
2541 val = sv[0].get<T>();
2542 }
2543 return r;
2544 }
2545
2546 template <typename T>
2547 Result parse_and_get_value(const char* s, T& val, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2548 auto n = strlen(s);
2549 return parse_and_get_value(s, n, val, path);
2550 }
2551
2552 template <typename T>
2553 Result parse_and_get_value(const char* s, size_t n, any& dt, T& val, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2554 SemanticValues sv;
2555 auto r = parse_core(s, n, sv, dt, path);
2556 if (r.ret && !sv.empty() && !sv.front().is_undefined()) {
2557 val = sv[0].get<T>();
2558 }
2559 return r;
2560 }
2561
2562 template <typename T>
2563 Result parse_and_get_value(const char* s, any& dt, T& val, const char* path = nullptr) const {
2564 auto n = strlen(s);
2565 return parse_and_get_value(s, n, dt, val, path);
2566 }
2567
2568 Action operator=(Action a) {
2569 action = a;
2570 return a;
2571 }
2572
2573 template <typename T>
2574 Definition& operator,(T fn) {
2575 operator=(fn);
2576 return *this;
2577 }
2578
2579 Definition& operator~() {
2580 ignoreSemanticValue = true;
2581 return *this;
2582 }
2583
2584 void accept(Ope::Visitor& v) {
2585 holder_->accept(v);
2586 }
2587
2588 std::shared_ptr<Ope> get_core_operator() const {
2589 return holder_->ope_;
2590 }
2591
2592 bool is_token() const {
2593 std::call_once(is_token_init_, [this]() {
2594 is_token_ = TokenChecker::is_token(*get_core_operator());
2595 });
2596 return is_token_;
2597 }
2598
2599 std::string name;
2600 size_t id;
2601 Action action;
2602 std::function<void (const char* s, size_t n, any& dt)> enter;
2603 std::function<void (const char* s, size_t n, size_t matchlen, any& value, any& dt)> leave;
2604 std::function<std::string ()> error_message;
2605 bool ignoreSemanticValue;
2606 std::shared_ptr<Ope> whitespaceOpe;
2607 std::shared_ptr<Ope> wordOpe;
2608 bool enablePackratParsing;
2609 bool is_macro;
2610 std::vector<std::string> params;
2611 Tracer tracer;
2612
2613private:
2614 friend class Reference;
2615
2616 Definition& operator=(const Definition& rhs);
2617 Definition& operator=(Definition&& rhs);
2618
2619 Result parse_core(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, any& dt, const char* path) const {
2620 std::shared_ptr<Ope> ope = holder_;
2621
2622 AssignIDToDefinition vis;
2623 holder_->accept(vis);
2624
2625 if (whitespaceOpe) {
2626 ope = std::make_shared<Sequence>(whitespaceOpe, ope);
2627 whitespaceOpe->accept(vis);
2628 }
2629
2630 if (wordOpe) {
2631 wordOpe->accept(vis);
2632 }
2633
2634 Context cxt(path, s, n, vis.ids.size(), whitespaceOpe, wordOpe, enablePackratParsing, tracer);
2635 auto len = ope->parse(s, n, sv, cxt, dt);
2636 return Result{ success(len), len, cxt.error_pos, cxt.message_pos, cxt.message };
2637 }
2638
2639 std::shared_ptr<Holder> holder_;
2640 mutable std::once_flag is_token_init_;
2641 mutable bool is_token_;
2642};
2643
2644/*
2645 * Implementations
2646 */
2647
2648inline size_t parse_literal(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt,
2649 const std::string& lit, bool& init_is_word, bool& is_word, bool ignore_case)
2650{
2651 size_t i = 0;
2652 for (; i < lit.size(); i++) {
2653 if (i >= n || (ignore_case ? (std::tolower(s[i]) != std::tolower(lit[i])) : (s[i] != lit[i]))) {
2654 c.set_error_pos(s);
2655 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
2656 }
2657 }
2658
2659 // Word check
2660 static Context dummy_c(nullptr, c.s, c.l, 0, nullptr, nullptr, false, nullptr);
2661 static SemanticValues dummy_sv;
2662 static any dummy_dt;
2663
2664 if (!init_is_word) { // TODO: Protect with mutex
2665 if (c.wordOpe) {
2666 auto len = c.wordOpe->parse(lit.data(), lit.size(), dummy_sv, dummy_c, dummy_dt);
2667 is_word = success(len);
2668 }
2669 init_is_word = true;
2670 }
2671
2672 if (is_word) {
2673 auto ope = std::make_shared<NotPredicate>(c.wordOpe);
2674 auto len = ope->parse(s + i, n - i, dummy_sv, dummy_c, dummy_dt);
2675 if (fail(len)) {
2676 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
2677 }
2678 i += len;
2679 }
2680
2681 // Skip whiltespace
2682 if (!c.in_token) {
2683 if (c.whitespaceOpe) {
2684 auto len = c.whitespaceOpe->parse(s + i, n - i, sv, c, dt);
2685 if (fail(len)) {
2686 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
2687 }
2688 i += len;
2689 }
2690 }
2691
2692 return i;
2693}
2694
2695inline size_t LiteralString::parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const {
2696 c.trace("LiteralString", s, n, sv, dt);
2697 return parse_literal(s, n, sv, c, dt, lit_, init_is_word_, is_word_, ignore_case_);
2698}
2699
2700inline size_t TokenBoundary::parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const {
2701 c.in_token = true;
2702 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() { c.in_token = false; });
2703 const auto& rule = *ope_;
2704 auto len = rule.parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
2705 if (success(len)) {
2706 sv.tokens.push_back(std::make_pair(s, len));
2707
2708 if (c.whitespaceOpe) {
2709 auto l = c.whitespaceOpe->parse(s + len, n - len, sv, c, dt);
2710 if (fail(l)) {
2711 return static_cast<size_t>(-1);
2712 }
2713 len += l;
2714 }
2715 }
2716 return len;
2717}
2718
2719inline size_t Holder::parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const {
2720 if (!ope_) {
2721 throw std::logic_error("Uninitialized definition ope was used...");
2722 }
2723
2724 c.trace(outer_->name.c_str(), s, n, sv, dt);
2725 c.nest_level++;
2726 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() {
2727 c.nest_level--;
2728 });
2729
2730 // Macro reference
2731 // TODO: need packrat support
2732 if (outer_->is_macro) {
2733 return ope_->parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
2734 }
2735
2736 size_t len;
2737 any val;
2738
2739 c.packrat(s, outer_->id, len, val, [&](any& a_val) {
2740 if (outer_->enter) {
2741 outer_->enter(s, n, dt);
2742 }
2743
2744 auto se2 = make_scope_exit([&]() {
2745 c.pop();
2746
2747 if (outer_->leave) {
2748 outer_->leave(s, n, len, a_val, dt);
2749 }
2750 });
2751
2752 auto& chldsv = c.push();
2753
2754 len = ope_->parse(s, n, chldsv, c, dt);
2755
2756 // Invoke action
2757 if (success(len)) {
2758 chldsv.s_ = s;
2759 chldsv.n_ = len;
2760 chldsv.name_ = outer_->name;
2761
2762 if (!IsPrioritizedChoice::check(*ope_)) {
2763 chldsv.choice_count_ = 0;
2764 chldsv.choice_ = 0;
2765 }
2766
2767 try {
2768 a_val = reduce(chldsv, dt);
2769 } catch (const parse_error& e) {
2770 if (e.what()) {
2771 if (c.message_pos < s) {
2772 c.message_pos = s;
2773 c.message = e.what();
2774 }
2775 }
2776 len = static_cast<size_t>(-1);
2777 }
2778 }
2779 });
2780
2781 if (success(len)) {
2782 if (!outer_->ignoreSemanticValue) {
2783 sv.emplace_back(val);
2784 sv.tags.emplace_back(str2tag(outer_->name.c_str()));
2785 }
2786 } else {
2787 if (outer_->error_message) {
2788 if (c.message_pos < s) {
2789 c.message_pos = s;
2790 c.message = outer_->error_message();
2791 }
2792 }
2793 }
2794
2795 return len;
2796}
2797
2798inline any Holder::reduce(SemanticValues& sv, any& dt) const {
2799 if (outer_->action) {
2800 return outer_->action(sv, dt);
2801 } else if (sv.empty()) {
2802 return any();
2803 } else {
2804 return std::move(sv.front());
2805 }
2806}
2807
2808inline size_t Reference::parse(
2809 const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const {
2810 if (rule_) {
2811 // Reference rule
2812 if (rule_->is_macro) {
2813 // Macro
2814 FindReference vis(c.top_args(), rule_->params);
2815
2816 // Collect arguments
2817 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<Ope>> args;
2818 for (auto arg: args_) {
2819 arg->accept(vis);
2820 args.push_back(vis.found_ope);
2821 }
2822
2823 c.push_args(args);
2824 auto se = make_scope_exit([&]() { c.pop_args(); });
2825 auto ope = get_core_operator();
2826 return ope->parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
2827 } else {
2828 // Definition
2829 auto ope = get_core_operator();
2830 return ope->parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
2831 }
2832 } else {
2833 // Reference parameter in macro
2834 const auto& args = c.top_args();
2835 return args[iarg_]->parse(s, n, sv, c, dt);
2836 }
2837}
2838
2839inline std::shared_ptr<Ope> Reference::get_core_operator() const {
2840 return rule_->holder_;
2841}
2842
2843inline size_t BackReference::parse(const char* s, size_t n, SemanticValues& sv, Context& c, any& dt) const {
2844 c.trace("BackReference", s, n, sv, dt);
2845 auto it = c.capture_scope_stack.rbegin();
2846 while (it != c.capture_scope_stack.rend()) {
2847 const auto& captures = *it;
2848 if (captures.find(name_) != captures.end()) {
2849 const auto& lit = captures.at(name_);
2850 auto init_is_word = false;
2851 auto is_word = false;
2852 return parse_literal(s, n, sv, c, dt, lit, init_is_word, is_word, false);
2853 }
2854 ++it;
2855 }
2856 throw std::runtime_error("Invalid back reference...");
