10692 if (0 != errorCode) {
10693 std::cerr << "[cluon::TCPConnection] Failed to perform socket operation: "; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10694#ifdef WIN32 // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10695 std::cerr << errorCode << std::endl;
10696#else
10697 std::cerr << ::strerror(errorCode) << " (" << errorCode << ")" << std::endl; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10698#endif // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10699 }
10700
10701 if (!(m_socket < 0)) {
10702#ifdef WIN32
10703 ::shutdown(m_socket, SD_BOTH);
10704 ::closesocket(m_socket);
10705 WSACleanup();
10706#else
10707 ::shutdown(m_socket, SHUT_RDWR); // Disallow further read/write operations.
10708 ::close(m_socket);
10709#endif
10710 }
10711 m_socket = -1;
10712}
10713
10714inline void TCPConnection::startReadingFromSocket() noexcept {
10715 // Constructing a thread could fail.
10716 try {
10717 m_readFromSocketThread = std::thread(&TCPConnection::readFromSocket, this);
10718
10719 // Let the operating system spawn the thread.
10720 using namespace std::literals::chrono_literals;
10721 do { std::this_thread::sleep_for(1ms); } while (!m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load());
10722 } catch (...) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10723 closeSocket(ECHILD); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10724 }
10725
10726 try {
10727 m_pipeline = std::make_shared<cluon::NotifyingPipeline<PipelineEntry>>(
10728 [this](PipelineEntry &&entry) { this->m_newDataDelegate(std::move(entry.m_data), std::move(entry.m_sampleTime)); });
10729 if (m_pipeline) {
10730 // Let the operating system spawn the thread.
10731 using namespace std::literals::chrono_literals; // NOLINT
10732 do { std::this_thread::sleep_for(1ms); } while (!m_pipeline->isRunning());
10733 }
10734 } catch (...) { closeSocket(ECHILD); } // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10735}
10736
10737inline void TCPConnection::setOnNewData(std::function<void(std::string &&, std::chrono::system_clock::time_point &&)> newDataDelegate) noexcept {
10738 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_newDataDelegateMutex);
10739 m_newDataDelegate = newDataDelegate;
10740}
10741
10742inline void TCPConnection::setOnConnectionLost(std::function<void()> connectionLostDelegate) noexcept {
10743 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_connectionLostDelegateMutex);
10744 m_connectionLostDelegate = connectionLostDelegate;
10745}
10746
10747inline bool TCPConnection::isRunning() const noexcept {
10748 return (m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load() && !TerminateHandler::instance().isTerminated.load());
10749}
10750
10751inline std::pair<ssize_t, int32_t> TCPConnection::send(std::string &&data) const noexcept {
10752 if (-1 == m_socket) {
10753 return {-1, EBADF};
10754 }
10755
10756 if (data.empty()) {
10757 return {0, 0};
10758 }
10759
10760 if (!m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load()) {
10761 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_connectionLostDelegateMutex); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10762 if (nullptr != m_connectionLostDelegate) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10763 m_connectionLostDelegate(); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10764 }
10765 return {-1, ENOTCONN}; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10766 }
10767
10768 constexpr uint16_t MAX_LENGTH{65535};
10769 if (MAX_LENGTH < data.size()) {
10770 return {-1, E2BIG};
10771 }
10772
10773 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_socketMutex);
10774 ssize_t bytesSent = ::send(m_socket, data.c_str(), data.length(), 0);
10775 return {bytesSent, (0 > bytesSent ? errno : 0)};
10776}
10777
10778inline void TCPConnection::readFromSocket() noexcept {
10779 // Create buffer to store data from socket.
10780 constexpr uint16_t MAX_LENGTH{65535};
10781 std::array<char, MAX_LENGTH> buffer{};
10782
10783 struct timeval timeout {};
10784
10785 // Define file descriptor set to watch for read operations.
10786 fd_set setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom{};
10787
10788 // Indicate to main thread that we are ready.
10789 m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.store(true);
10790
10791 // This flag is used to not read data from the socket until this TCPConnection has a proper onNewDataHandler set.
10792 bool hasNewDataDelegate{false};
10793
10794 while (m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load()) {
10795 // Define timeout for select system call. The timeval struct must be
10796 // reinitialized for every select call as it might be modified containing
10797 // the actual time slept.
10798 timeout.tv_sec = 0;
10799 timeout.tv_usec = 20 * 1000; // Check for new data with 50Hz.
10800
10801 FD_ZERO(&setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom);
10802 FD_SET(m_socket, &setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom);
10803 ::select(m_socket + 1, &setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom, nullptr, nullptr, &timeout);
10804
10805 // Only read data when the newDataDelegate is set.
10806 if (!hasNewDataDelegate) {
10807 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_newDataDelegateMutex);
10808 hasNewDataDelegate = (nullptr != m_newDataDelegate);
10809 }
10810 if (FD_ISSET(m_socket, &setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom) && hasNewDataDelegate) {
10811 ssize_t bytesRead = ::recv(m_socket, buffer.data(), buffer.max_size(), 0);
10812 if (0 >= bytesRead) {
10813 // 0 == bytesRead: peer shut down the connection; 0 > bytesRead: other error.
10814 m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.store(false);
10815
10816 {
10817 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_connectionLostDelegateMutex);
10818 if (nullptr != m_connectionLostDelegate) {
10819 m_connectionLostDelegate();
10820 }
10821 }
10822 break;
10823 }
10824
10825 {
10826 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(m_newDataDelegateMutex);
10827 if ((0 < bytesRead) && (nullptr != m_newDataDelegate)) {
10828 // SIOCGSTAMP is not available for a stream-based socket,
10829 // thus, falling back to regular chrono timestamping.
10830 std::chrono::system_clock::time_point timestamp = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
10831 {
10832 PipelineEntry pe;
10833 pe.m_data = std::string(buffer.data(), static_cast<size_t>(bytesRead));
10834 pe.m_sampleTime = timestamp;
10835
10836 // Store entry in queue.
10837 if (m_pipeline) {
10838 m_pipeline->add(std::move(pe));
10839 }
10840 }
10841
10842 if (m_pipeline) {
10843 m_pipeline->notifyAll();
10844 }
10845 }
10846 }
10847 }
10848 }
10849}
10850} // namespace cluon
10851/*
10852 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
10853 *
10854 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
10855 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
10856 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
10857 */
10858
10859//#include "cluon/TCPServer.hpp"
10860//#include "cluon/TerminateHandler.hpp"
10861
10862// clang-format off
10863#ifdef WIN32
10864 #include <errno.h>
10865 #include <iostream>
10866#else
10867 #include <arpa/inet.h>
10868 #include <sys/ioctl.h>
10869 #include <sys/socket.h>
10870 #include <sys/types.h>
10871 #include <unistd.h>
10872#endif
10873// clang-format on
10874
10875#include <cstring>
10876#include <array>
10877#include <iostream>
10878#include <memory>
10879#include <sstream>
10880
10881namespace cluon {
10882
10883inline TCPServer::TCPServer(uint16_t port, std::function<void(std::string &&from, std::shared_ptr<cluon::TCPConnection> connection)> newConnectionDelegate) noexcept
10884 : m_newConnectionDelegate(newConnectionDelegate) {
10885 if (0 < port) {
10886#ifdef WIN32
10887 // Load Winsock 2.2 DLL.
10888 WSADATA wsaData;
10889 if (WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(2, 2), &wsaData) != 0) {
10890 std::cerr << "[cluon::TCPServer] Error while calling WSAStartUp: " << WSAGetLastError() << std::endl;
10891 }
10892#endif
10893 m_socket = ::socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP);
10894
10895#ifdef WIN32
10896 if (m_socket < 0) {
10897 std::cerr << "[cluon::TCPServer] Error while creating socket: " << WSAGetLastError() << std::endl;
10898 WSACleanup();
10899 }
10900#endif
10901
10902 if (!(m_socket < 0)) {
10903 // Allow reusing of ports by multiple calls with same address/port.
10904 uint32_t YES = 1;
10905 // clang-format off
10906 auto retVal = ::setsockopt(m_socket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, reinterpret_cast<char *>(&YES), sizeof(YES)); // NOLINT
10907 // clang-format on
10908 if (0 > retVal) {
10909#ifdef WIN32 // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10910 auto errorCode = WSAGetLastError();
10911#else
10912 auto errorCode = errno; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10913#endif // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10914 closeSocket(errorCode); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10915 }
10916 }
10917
10918 if (!(m_socket < 0)) {
10919 // Setup address and port.
10920 struct sockaddr_in address;
10921 ::memset(&address, 0, sizeof(address));
10922 address.sin_family = AF_INET;
10923 address.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
10924 address.sin_port = htons(port);
10925
10926 auto retVal = ::bind(m_socket, reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr *>(&address), sizeof(address));
10927 if (-1 != retVal) {
10928 constexpr int32_t MAX_PENDING_CONNECTIONS{100};
10929 retVal = ::listen(m_socket, MAX_PENDING_CONNECTIONS);
10930 if (-1 != retVal) {
10931 // Constructing a thread could fail.
10932 try {
10933 m_readFromSocketThread = std::thread(&TCPServer::readFromSocket, this);
10934
10935 // Let the operating system spawn the thread.
10936 using namespace std::literals::chrono_literals;
10937 do { std::this_thread::sleep_for(1ms); } while (!m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load());
10938 } catch (...) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10939 closeSocket(ECHILD); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10940 }
10941 } else { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10942#ifdef WIN32 // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10943 auto errorCode = WSAGetLastError();
10944#else
10945 auto errorCode = errno; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10946#endif // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10947 closeSocket(errorCode); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10948 }
10949 } else { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10950#ifdef WIN32 // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10951 auto errorCode = WSAGetLastError();
10952#else
10953 auto errorCode = errno; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10954#endif // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10955 closeSocket(errorCode); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10956 }
10957 }
10958 }
10959}
10960
10961inline TCPServer::~TCPServer() noexcept {
10962 m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.store(false);
10963
10964 // Joining the thread could fail.
10965 try {
10966 if (m_readFromSocketThread.joinable()) {
10967 m_readFromSocketThread.join();
10968 }
10969 } catch (...) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10970 }
10971
10972 closeSocket(0);
10973}
10974
10975inline void TCPServer::closeSocket(int errorCode) noexcept {
10976 if (0 != errorCode) {
10977 std::cerr << "[cluon::TCPServer] Failed to perform socket operation: "; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10978#ifdef WIN32 // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10979 std::cerr << errorCode << std::endl;
10980#else
10981 std::cerr << ::strerror(errorCode) << " (" << errorCode << ")" << std::endl; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10982#endif // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
10983 }
10984
10985 if (!(m_socket < 0)) {
10986#ifdef WIN32
10987 ::shutdown(m_socket, SD_BOTH);
10988 ::closesocket(m_socket);
10989 WSACleanup();
10990#else
10991 ::shutdown(m_socket, SHUT_RDWR); // Disallow further read/write operations.
10992 ::close(m_socket);
10993#endif
10994 }
10995 m_socket = -1;
10996}
10997
10998inline bool TCPServer::isRunning() const noexcept {
10999 return (m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load() && !TerminateHandler::instance().isTerminated.load());
11000}
11001
11002inline void TCPServer::readFromSocket() noexcept {
11003 struct timeval timeout {};
11004
11005 // Define file descriptor set to watch for read operations.
11006 fd_set setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom{};
11007
11008 // Indicate to main thread that we are ready.
11009 m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.store(true);
11010
11011 constexpr uint16_t MAX_ADDR_SIZE{1024};
11012 std::array<char, MAX_ADDR_SIZE> remoteAddress{};
11013
11014 while (m_readFromSocketThreadRunning.load()) {
11015 // Define timeout for select system call. The timeval struct must be
11016 // reinitialized for every select call as it might be modified containing
11017 // the actual time slept.
11018 timeout.tv_sec = 0;
11019 timeout.tv_usec = 20 * 1000; // Check for new data with 50Hz.
11020
11021 FD_ZERO(&setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom);
11022 FD_SET(m_socket, &setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom);
11023 ::select(m_socket + 1, &setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom, nullptr, nullptr, &timeout);
11024 if (FD_ISSET(m_socket, &setOfFiledescriptorsToReadFrom)) {
11025 struct sockaddr_storage remote;
11026 socklen_t addrLength = sizeof(remote);
11027 int32_t connectingClient = ::accept(m_socket, reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr *>(&remote), &addrLength);
11028 if ((0 <= connectingClient) && (nullptr != m_newConnectionDelegate)) {
11029 ::inet_ntop(remote.ss_family,
11030 &((reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in *>(&remote))->sin_addr), // NOLINT
11031 remoteAddress.data(),
11032 remoteAddress.max_size());
11033 const uint16_t RECVFROM_PORT{ntohs(reinterpret_cast<struct sockaddr_in *>(&remote)->sin_port)}; // NOLINT
11034 m_newConnectionDelegate(std::string(remoteAddress.data()) + ':' + std::to_string(RECVFROM_PORT),
11035 std::shared_ptr<cluon::TCPConnection>(new cluon::TCPConnection(connectingClient)));
11036 }
11037 }
11038 }
11039}
11040} // namespace cluon
11041/*
11042 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
11043 *
11044 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
11045 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
11046 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
11047 */
11048
11049//#include "cluon/ToProtoVisitor.hpp"
11050
11051#include <cstring>
11052
11053namespace cluon {
11054
11055inline std::string ToProtoVisitor::encodedData() const noexcept {
11056 std::string s{m_buffer.str()};
11057 return s;
11058}
11059
11060inline void ToProtoVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
11061 (void)id;
11062 (void)shortName;
11063 (void)longName;
11064}
11065
11066inline void ToProtoVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
11067
11068inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
11069 (void)typeName;
11070 (void)name;
11071 toKeyValue<bool>(id, v);
11072}
11073
11074inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
11075 (void)typeName;
11076 (void)name;
11077 uint8_t _v = static_cast<uint8_t>(v); // NOLINT
11078 toKeyValue<uint8_t>(id, _v);
11079}
11080
11081inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
11082 (void)typeName;
11083 (void)name;
11084 toKeyValue<int8_t>(id, v);
11085}
11086
11087inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
11088 (void)typeName;
11089 (void)name;
11090 toKeyValue<uint8_t>(id, v);
11091}
11092
11093inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
11094 (void)typeName;
11095 (void)name;
11096 toKeyValue<int16_t>(id, v);
11097}
11098
11099inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
11100 (void)typeName;
11101 (void)name;
11102 toKeyValue<uint16_t>(id, v);
11103}
11104
11105inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
11106 (void)typeName;
11107 (void)name;
11108 toKeyValue<int32_t>(id, v);
11109}
11110
11111inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
11112 (void)typeName;
11113 (void)name;
11114 toKeyValue<uint32_t>(id, v);
11115}
11116
11117inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
11118 (void)typeName;
11119 (void)name;
11120 toKeyValue<int64_t>(id, v);
11121}
11122
11123inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
11124 (void)typeName;
11125 (void)name;
11126 toKeyValue<uint64_t>(id, v);
11127}
11128
11129inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
11130 (void)typeName;
11131 (void)name;
11132 uint64_t key = encodeKey(id, static_cast<uint8_t>(ProtoConstants::FOUR_BYTES));
11133 toVarInt(m_buffer, key);
11134 encode(m_buffer, v);
11135}
11136
11137inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
11138 (void)typeName;
11139 (void)name;
11140 uint64_t key = encodeKey(id, static_cast<uint8_t>(ProtoConstants::EIGHT_BYTES));
11141 toVarInt(m_buffer, key);
11142 encode(m_buffer, v);
11143}
11144
11145inline void ToProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
11146 (void)typeName;
11147 (void)name;
11148 uint64_t key = encodeKey(id, static_cast<uint8_t>(ProtoConstants::LENGTH_DELIMITED));
11149 toVarInt(m_buffer, key);
11150 encode(m_buffer, v);
11151}
11152
11154
11155inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, bool &v) noexcept {
11156 uint64_t _v{(v ? 1u : 0u)};
11157 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11158}
11159
11160inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, int8_t &v) noexcept {
11161 uint64_t _v = toZigZag8(v);
11162 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11163}
11164
11165inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
11166 uint64_t _v = v;
11167 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11168}
11169
11170inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, int16_t &v) noexcept {
11171 uint64_t _v = toZigZag16(v);
11172 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11173}
11174
11175inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
11176 uint64_t _v = v;
11177 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11178}
11179
11180inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, int32_t &v) noexcept {
11181 uint64_t _v = toZigZag32(v);
11182 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11183}
11184
11185inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
11186 uint64_t _v = v;
11187 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11188}
11189
11190inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, int64_t &v) noexcept {
11191 uint64_t _v = toZigZag64(v);
11192 return toVarInt(o, _v);
11193}
11194
11195inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
11196 return toVarInt(o, v);
11197}
11198
11199inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, float &v) noexcept {
11200 // Store 4 bytes as little endian encoding.
11201 uint32_t _v{0};
11202 std::memmove(&_v, &v, sizeof(float));
11203 _v = htole32(_v);
11204 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint32_t)); // NOLINT
11205 return sizeof(uint32_t);
11206}
11207
11208inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, double &v) noexcept {
11209 // Store 8 bytes as little endian encoding.
11210 uint64_t _v{0};
11211 std::memmove(&_v, &v, sizeof(double));
11212 _v = htole64(_v);
11213 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint64_t)); // NOLINT
11214 return sizeof(uint64_t);
11215}
11216
11217inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, const std::string &v) noexcept {
11218 const std::size_t LENGTH = v.length();
11219 std::size_t size = toVarInt(o, LENGTH);
11220 o.write(v.c_str(), static_cast<std::streamsize>(LENGTH)); // LENGTH won't be negative.
11221 return size + LENGTH;
11222}
11223
11224inline uint8_t ToProtoVisitor::toZigZag8(int8_t v) noexcept {
11225 return static_cast<uint8_t>((v << 1) ^ (v >> ((sizeof(v) * 8) - 1)));
11226}
11227
11228inline uint16_t ToProtoVisitor::toZigZag16(int16_t v) noexcept {
11229 return static_cast<uint16_t>((v << 1) ^ (v >> ((sizeof(v) * 8) - 1)));
11230}
11231
11232inline uint32_t ToProtoVisitor::toZigZag32(int32_t v) noexcept {
11233 return static_cast<uint32_t>((v << 1) ^ (v >> ((sizeof(v) * 8) - 1)));
11234}
11235
11236inline uint64_t ToProtoVisitor::toZigZag64(int64_t v) noexcept {
11237 return static_cast<uint64_t>((v << 1) ^ (v >> ((sizeof(v) * 8) - 1)));
11238}
11239
11240inline uint64_t ToProtoVisitor::encodeKey(uint32_t fieldIdentifier, uint8_t protoType) noexcept {
11241 return (fieldIdentifier << 0x3) | protoType;
11242}
11243
11244inline std::size_t ToProtoVisitor::toVarInt(std::ostream &out, uint64_t v) noexcept {
11245 // Minimum size is of the encoded data.
11246 std::size_t size{1};
11247 uint8_t b{0};
11248 while (0x7f < v) {
11249 // Use the MSB to indicate value overflow for more bytes to come.
11250 b = (static_cast<uint8_t>(v & 0x7f)) | 0x80;
11251 out.put(static_cast<char>(b));
11252 v >>= 7;
11253 size++;
11254 }
11255 // Write final byte.
11256 b = (static_cast<uint8_t>(v)) & 0x7f;
11257 out.put(static_cast<char>(b));
11258
11259 return size;
11260}
11261} // namespace cluon
11262/*
11263 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
11264 *
11265 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
11266 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
11267 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
11268 */
11269
11270//#include "cluon/FromProtoVisitor.hpp"
11271
11272#include <cstddef>
11273#include <cstring>
11274#include <utility>
11275
11276namespace cluon {
11277
11278inline void FromProtoVisitor::readBytesFromStream(std::istream &in, std::size_t bytesToReadFromStream, char *buffer) noexcept {
11279 if (nullptr != buffer) {
11280 const constexpr std::size_t CHUNK_SIZE{1024};
11281 std::streamsize bufferPosition{0};
11282 std::streamsize extractedBytes{0};
11283
11284 while ((0 < bytesToReadFromStream) && in.good()) {
11285 // clang-format off
11286 in.read(&buffer[static_cast<std::size_t>(bufferPosition)], /* Flawfinder: ignore */ /* Cf. buffer.reserve(...) above. */
11287 (bytesToReadFromStream > CHUNK_SIZE) ? CHUNK_SIZE : static_cast<std::streamsize>(bytesToReadFromStream));
11288 // clang-format on
11289 extractedBytes = in.gcount();
11290 bufferPosition += extractedBytes;
11291 bytesToReadFromStream -= static_cast<std::size_t>(extractedBytes);
11292 }
11293 }
11294}
11295
11296inline void FromProtoVisitor::decodeFrom(std::istream &in) noexcept {
11297 // Reset internal states as this deserializer could be reused.
11298 m_mapOfKeyValues.clear();
11299 while (in.good()) {
11300 // First stage: Read keyFieldType (encoded as VarInt).
11301 if (0 < fromVarInt(in, m_keyFieldType)) {
11302 // Succeeded to read keyFieldType entry; extract information.
11303 m_protoType = static_cast<ProtoConstants>(m_keyFieldType & 0x7);
11304 m_fieldId = static_cast<uint32_t>(m_keyFieldType >> 3);
11305 switch (m_protoType) {
11306 case ProtoConstants::VARINT:
11307 {
11308 // Directly decode VarInt value.
11309 fromVarInt(in, m_value);
11310 m_mapOfKeyValues.emplace(m_fieldId, linb::any(m_value));
11311 }
11312 break;
11313 case ProtoConstants::EIGHT_BYTES:
11314 {
11315 readBytesFromStream(in, sizeof(double), m_doubleValue.buffer.data());
11316 m_doubleValue.uint64Value = le64toh(m_doubleValue.uint64Value);
11317 m_mapOfKeyValues.emplace(m_fieldId, linb::any(m_doubleValue.doubleValue));
11318 }
11319 break;
11320 case ProtoConstants::FOUR_BYTES:
11321 {
11322 readBytesFromStream(in, sizeof(float), m_floatValue.buffer.data());
11323 m_floatValue.uint32Value = le32toh(m_floatValue.uint32Value);
11324 m_mapOfKeyValues.emplace(m_fieldId, linb::any(m_floatValue.floatValue));
11325 }
11326 break;
11327 case ProtoConstants::LENGTH_DELIMITED:
11328 {
11329 fromVarInt(in, m_value);
11330 const std::size_t BYTES_TO_READ_FROM_STREAM{static_cast<std::size_t>(m_value)};
11331 if (m_stringValue.capacity() < BYTES_TO_READ_FROM_STREAM) {
11332 m_stringValue.reserve(BYTES_TO_READ_FROM_STREAM);
11333 }
11334 readBytesFromStream(in, BYTES_TO_READ_FROM_STREAM, m_stringValue.data());
11335 m_mapOfKeyValues.emplace(m_fieldId, linb::any(std::string(m_stringValue.data(), static_cast<std::size_t>(m_value))));
11336 }
11337 break;
11338 }
11339 }
11340 }
11341}
11342
11344
11345inline FromProtoVisitor &FromProtoVisitor::operator=(const FromProtoVisitor &other) noexcept {
11346 m_mapOfKeyValues = other.m_mapOfKeyValues;
11347 return *this;
11348}
11349
11351
11352inline void FromProtoVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
11353 (void)id;
11354 (void)shortName;
11355 (void)longName;
11356}
11357
11358inline void FromProtoVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
11359
11360inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
11361 (void)typeName;
11362 (void)name;
11363 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11364 v = (0 != m_value);
11365 }
11366 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11367 try {
11368 v = (0 != linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]));
11369 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11370 }
11371 }
11372}
11373
11374inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
11375 (void)typeName;
11376 (void)name;
11377 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11378 v = static_cast<char>(m_value);
11379 }
11380 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11381 try {
11382 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11383 v = static_cast<char>(_v);
11384 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11385 }
11386 }
11387}
11388
11389inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
11390 (void)typeName;
11391 (void)name;
11392 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11393 v = static_cast<int8_t>(fromZigZag8(static_cast<uint8_t>(m_value)));
11394 }
11395 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11396 try {
11397 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11398 v = static_cast<int8_t>(fromZigZag8(static_cast<uint8_t>(_v)));
11399 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11400 }
11401 }
11402}
11403
11404inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
11405 (void)typeName;
11406 (void)name;
11407 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11408 v = static_cast<uint8_t>(m_value);
11409 }
11410 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11411 try {
11412 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11413 v = static_cast<uint8_t>(_v);
11414 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11415 }
11416 }
11417}
11418
11419inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
11420 (void)typeName;
11421 (void)name;
11422 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11423 v = static_cast<int16_t>(fromZigZag16(static_cast<uint16_t>(m_value)));
11424 }
11425 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11426 try {
11427 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11428 v = static_cast<int16_t>(fromZigZag16(static_cast<uint16_t>(_v)));
11429 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11430 }
11431 }
11432}
11433
11434inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
11435 (void)typeName;
11436 (void)name;
11437 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11438 v = static_cast<uint16_t>(m_value);
11439 }
11440 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11441 try {
11442 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11443 v = static_cast<uint16_t>(_v);
11444 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11445 }
11446 }
11447}
11448
11449inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
11450 (void)typeName;
11451 (void)name;
11452 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11453 v = static_cast<int32_t>(fromZigZag32(static_cast<uint32_t>(m_value)));
11454 }
11455 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11456 try {
11457 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11458 v = static_cast<int32_t>(fromZigZag32(static_cast<uint32_t>(_v)));
11459 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11460 }
11461 }
11462}
11463
11464inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
11465 (void)typeName;
11466 (void)name;
11467 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11468 v = static_cast<uint32_t>(m_value);
11469 }
11470 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11471 try {
11472 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11473 v = static_cast<uint32_t>(_v);
11474 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11475 }
11476 }
11477}
11478
11479inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
11480 (void)typeName;
11481 (void)name;
11482 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11483 v = static_cast<int64_t>(fromZigZag64(static_cast<uint64_t>(m_value)));
11484 }
11485 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11486 try {
11487 uint64_t _v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11488 v = static_cast<int64_t>(fromZigZag64(_v));
11489 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11490 }
11491 }
11492}
11493
11494inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
11495 (void)typeName;
11496 (void)name;
11497 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11498 v = m_value;
11499 }
11500 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11501 try {
11502 v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11503 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11504 }
11505 }
11506}
11507
11508inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
11509 (void)typeName;
11510 (void)name;
11511 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11512 v = m_floatValue.floatValue;
11513 }
11514 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11515 try {
11516 v = linb::any_cast<float>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11517 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11518 }
11519 }
11520}
11521
11522inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
11523 (void)typeName;
11524 (void)name;
11525 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11526 v = m_doubleValue.doubleValue;
11527 }
11528 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11529 try {
11530 v = linb::any_cast<double>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11531 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11532 }
11533 }
11534}
11535
11536inline void FromProtoVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
11537 (void)typeName;
11538 (void)name;
11539 if (m_callToDecodeFromWithDirectVisit) {
11540 v = std::string(m_stringValue.data(), static_cast<std::size_t>(m_value));
11541 }
11542 else if (m_mapOfKeyValues.count(id) > 0) {
11543 try {
11544 v = linb::any_cast<std::string>(m_mapOfKeyValues[id]);
11545 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11546 }
11547 }
11548}
11549
11551
11552inline int8_t FromProtoVisitor::fromZigZag8(uint8_t v) noexcept {
11553 return static_cast<int8_t>((v >> 1) ^ -(v & 1));
11554}
11555
11556inline int16_t FromProtoVisitor::fromZigZag16(uint16_t v) noexcept {
11557 return static_cast<int16_t>((v >> 1) ^ -(v & 1));
11558}
11559
11560inline int32_t FromProtoVisitor::fromZigZag32(uint32_t v) noexcept {
11561 return static_cast<int32_t>((v >> 1) ^ -(v & 1));
11562}
11563
11564inline int64_t FromProtoVisitor::fromZigZag64(uint64_t v) noexcept {
11565 return static_cast<int64_t>((v >> 1) ^ -(v & 1));
11566}
11567
11568inline std::size_t FromProtoVisitor::fromVarInt(std::istream &in, uint64_t &value) noexcept {
11569 value = 0;
11570
11571 constexpr uint64_t MASK = 0x7f;
11572 constexpr uint64_t SHIFT = 0x7;
11573 constexpr uint64_t MSB = 0x80;
11574
11575 std::size_t size = 0;
11576 uint64_t C{0};
11577 while (in.good()) {
11578 auto x = in.get();
11579 C = static_cast<uint64_t>(x);
11580 value |= (C & MASK) << (SHIFT * size++);
11581 if (!(C & MSB)) { // NOLINT
11582 break;
11583 }
11584 }
11585
11586 return size;
11587}
11588} // namespace cluon
11589/*
11590 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
11591 *
11592 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
11593 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
11594 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
11595 */
11596
11597// clang-format off
11598#ifdef WIN32
11599 #include <Winsock2.h> // for ntohll
11600#endif
11601// clang-format on
11602
11603//#include "cluon/FromLCMVisitor.hpp"
11604
11605#include <cstring>
11606#include <algorithm>
11607#include <iostream>
11608#include <vector>
11609
11610namespace cluon {
11611
11612inline FromLCMVisitor::FromLCMVisitor() noexcept
11613 : m_buffer(m_internalBuffer) {}
11614
11615inline FromLCMVisitor::FromLCMVisitor(std::stringstream &in) noexcept
11616 : m_expectedHash{0}
11617 , m_buffer(in) {}
11618
11619inline void FromLCMVisitor::decodeFrom(std::istream &in) noexcept {
11620 // Reset internal states as this deserializer could be reused.
11621 m_buffer.clear();
11622 m_buffer.str("");
11623
11624 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&m_expectedHash), sizeof(int64_t));
11625 m_expectedHash = static_cast<int64_t>(be64toh(m_expectedHash));
11626
11627 m_buffer << in.rdbuf();
11628}
11629
11631
11632inline void FromLCMVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
11633 (void)id;
11634 (void)shortName;
11635 (void)longName;
11636
11637 // Reset m_buffer read pointer to beginning only if we are not dealing with
11638 // nested complex types as we are sharing our buffer with our parent message.
11639 if (0 != m_expectedHash) {
11640 m_buffer.clear();
11641 m_buffer.seekg(0);
11642 m_calculatedHash = 0x12345678;
11643 m_hashes.clear();
11644 }
11645}
11646
11647inline void FromLCMVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {
11648 if ((0 != m_expectedHash) && (m_expectedHash != hash())) {
11649 std::cerr << "[cluon::FromLCMVisitor] Hash mismatch - decoding might have failed" << std::endl; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11650 }
11651}
11652
11653inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
11654 (void)id;
11655 (void)typeName;
11656 calculateHash(name);
11657 calculateHash("boolean");
11658 calculateHash(0);
11659 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(bool));
11660}
11661
11662inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
11663 (void)id;
11664 (void)typeName;
11665 calculateHash(name);
11666 calculateHash("int8_t");
11667 calculateHash(0);
11668 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(char));
11669}
11670
11671inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
11672 (void)id;
11673 (void)typeName;
11674 calculateHash(name);
11675 calculateHash("int8_t");
11676 calculateHash(0);
11677 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(int8_t));
11678}
11679
11680inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
11681 (void)id;
11682 (void)typeName;
11683 calculateHash(name);
11684 calculateHash("int8_t");
11685 calculateHash(0);
11686 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(int8_t));
11687}
11688
11689inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
11690 (void)id;
11691 (void)typeName;
11692 calculateHash(name);
11693 calculateHash("int16_t");
11694 calculateHash(0);
11695 int16_t _v{0};
11696 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int16_t));
11697 v = static_cast<int16_t>(be16toh(_v));
11698}
11699
11700inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
11701 (void)id;
11702 (void)typeName;
11703 calculateHash(name);
11704 calculateHash("int16_t");
11705 calculateHash(0);
11706 int16_t _v{0};
11707 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int16_t));
11708 v = be16toh(_v);
11709}
11710
11711inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
11712 (void)id;
11713 (void)typeName;
11714 calculateHash(name);
11715 calculateHash("int32_t");
11716 calculateHash(0);
11717 int32_t _v{0};
11718 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
11719 v = static_cast<int32_t>(be32toh(_v));
11720}
11721
11722inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
11723 (void)id;
11724 (void)typeName;
11725 calculateHash(name);
11726 calculateHash("int32_t");
11727 calculateHash(0);
11728 int32_t _v{0};
11729 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
11730 v = be32toh(_v);
11731}
11732
11733inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
11734 (void)id;
11735 (void)typeName;
11736 calculateHash(name);
11737 calculateHash("int64_t");
11738 calculateHash(0);
11739 int64_t _v{0};
11740 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
11741 v = static_cast<int64_t>(be64toh(_v));
11742}
11743
11744inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
11745 (void)id;
11746 (void)typeName;
11747 calculateHash(name);
11748 calculateHash("int64_t");
11749 calculateHash(0);
11750 int64_t _v{0};
11751 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
11752 v = be64toh(_v);
11753}
11754
11755inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
11756 (void)id;
11757 (void)typeName;
11758 calculateHash(name);
11759 calculateHash("float");
11760 calculateHash(0);
11761 int32_t _v{0};
11762 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
11763 _v = static_cast<int32_t>(be32toh(_v));
11764 std::memmove(&v, &_v, sizeof(int32_t));
11765}
11766
11767inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
11768 (void)id;
11769 (void)typeName;
11770 calculateHash(name);
11771 calculateHash("double");
11772 calculateHash(0);
11773 int64_t _v{0};
11774 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
11775 _v = static_cast<int64_t>(be64toh(_v));
11776 std::memmove(&v, &_v, sizeof(int64_t));
11777}
11778
11779inline void FromLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
11780 (void)id;
11781 (void)typeName;
11782 (void)name;
11783 (void)v;
11784 calculateHash(name);
11785 calculateHash("string");
11786 calculateHash(0);
11787
11788 int32_t length{0};
11789 m_buffer.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&length), sizeof(int32_t));
11790 length = static_cast<int32_t>(be32toh(length));
11791
11792 v.clear();
11793 if (length > 0) {
11794 std::vector<char> buffer;
11795 buffer.reserve(static_cast<uint32_t>(length));
11796#ifdef WIN32
11797 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < static_cast<uint32_t>(length); i++) {
11798 char c;
11799 m_buffer.get(c);
11800 buffer.push_back(c);
11801 }
11802#else
11803 m_buffer.read(static_cast<char *>(&buffer[0]), static_cast<std::streamsize>(length));
11804#endif
11805 const std::string s(buffer.begin(), buffer.begin() + length - 1); // Skip trailing '\0'.
11806 v = s;
11807 }
11808}
11809
11811
11812inline int64_t FromLCMVisitor::hash() const noexcept {
11813 // Apply ZigZag encoding for hash from this message's fields and depending
11814 // hashes for complex nested types.
11815 int64_t tmp{m_calculatedHash};
11816 for (int64_t v : m_hashes) { tmp += v; }
11817
11818 const int64_t hash = (tmp << 1) + ((tmp >> 63) & 1);
11819 return hash;
11820}
11821
11822inline void FromLCMVisitor::calculateHash(char c) noexcept {
11823 m_calculatedHash = ((m_calculatedHash << 8) ^ (m_calculatedHash >> 55)) + c;
11824}
11825
11826inline void FromLCMVisitor::calculateHash(const std::string &s) noexcept {
11827 const std::string tmp{(s.length() > 255 ? s.substr(0, 255) : s)};
11828 const uint8_t length{static_cast<uint8_t>(tmp.length())};
11829 calculateHash(static_cast<char>(length));
11830 for (auto c : tmp) { calculateHash(c); }
11831}
11832
11833} // namespace cluon

11838 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
11839 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
11840 */
11841
11842// clang-format off
11843#ifdef WIN32
11844 #include <Winsock2.h> // for ntohl, ntohs
11845#endif
11846// clang-format on
11847
11848//#include "cluon/FromMsgPackVisitor.hpp"
11849
11850#include <cstring>
11851#include <vector>
11852
11853namespace cluon {
11854
11855inline FromMsgPackVisitor::FromMsgPackVisitor() noexcept
11856 : m_keyValues{m_data} {}
11857
11858inline FromMsgPackVisitor::FromMsgPackVisitor(std::map<std::string, FromMsgPackVisitor::MsgPackKeyValue> &preset) noexcept
11859 : m_keyValues{preset} {}
11860
11861inline MsgPackConstants FromMsgPackVisitor::getFormatFamily(uint8_t T) noexcept {
11862 MsgPackConstants formatFamily{MsgPackConstants::UNKNOWN_FORMAT};
11863
11864 if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::IS_FALSE) == T) {
11865 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::BOOL_FORMAT;
11866 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::IS_TRUE) == T) {
11867 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::BOOL_FORMAT;
11868 } else if (0x7F >= T) {
11869 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT;
11870 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT8) == T) {
11871 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT;
11872 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT16) == T) {
11873 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT;
11874 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT32) == T) {
11875 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT;
11876 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT64) == T) {
11877 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT;
11878 } else if (0xE0 <= T) {
11879 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT;
11880 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT8) == T) {
11881 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT;
11882 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT16) == T) {
11883 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT;
11884 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT32) == T) {
11885 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT;
11886 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT64) == T) {
11887 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT;
11888 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FLOAT) == T) {
11889 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::FLOAT_FORMAT;
11890 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::DOUBLE) == T) {
11891 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::FLOAT_FORMAT;
11892 } else if ((static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXSTR) <= T) && (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXSTR_END) > T)) {
11893 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::STR_FORMAT;
11894 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR8) == T) {
11895 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::STR_FORMAT;
11896 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR16) == T) {
11897 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::STR_FORMAT;
11898 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR32) == T) {
11899 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::STR_FORMAT;
11900 } else if ((static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXMAP) <= T) && (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXMAP_END) > T)) {
11901 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::MAP_FORMAT;
11902 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::MAP16) == T) {
11903 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::MAP_FORMAT;
11904 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::MAP32) == T) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11905 formatFamily = MsgPackConstants::MAP_FORMAT; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
11906 }
11907
11908 return formatFamily;
11909}
11910
11911inline uint64_t FromMsgPackVisitor::readUint(std::istream &in) noexcept {
11912 uint64_t retVal{0};
11913 if (in.good()) {
11914 uint8_t c = static_cast<uint8_t>(in.get());
11915 if (MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT == getFormatFamily(c)) {
11916 if (0x7F >= c) {
11917 retVal = static_cast<uint64_t>(c);
11918 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT8) == c) {
11919 uint8_t v{0};
11920 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(uint8_t));
11921 retVal = static_cast<uint64_t>(v);
11922 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT16) == c) {
11923 uint16_t v{0};
11924 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(uint16_t));
11925 v = be16toh(v);
11926 retVal = static_cast<uint64_t>(v);
11927 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT32) == c) {
11928 uint32_t v{0};
11929 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(uint32_t));
11930 v = be32toh(v);
11931 retVal = static_cast<uint64_t>(v);
11932 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT64) == c) {
11933 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&retVal), sizeof(uint64_t));
11934 retVal = be64toh(retVal);
11935 }
11936 }
11937 }
11938 return retVal;
11939}
11940
11941inline int64_t FromMsgPackVisitor::readInt(std::istream &in) noexcept {
11942 int64_t retVal{0};
11943 if (in.good()) {
11944 int8_t c = static_cast<int8_t>(in.get());
11945 if (MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT == getFormatFamily(static_cast<uint8_t>(c))) {
11946 if (0xE0 <= static_cast<uint8_t>(c)) {
11947 retVal = static_cast<int64_t>(c);
11948 } else if (static_cast<int8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT8) == c) {
11949 int8_t v{0};
11950 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(int8_t));
11951 retVal = static_cast<int64_t>(v);
11952 } else if (static_cast<int8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT16) == c) {
11953 int16_t v{0};
11954 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(int16_t));
11955 v = static_cast<int16_t>(be16toh(v));
11956 retVal = static_cast<int64_t>(v);
11957 } else if (static_cast<int8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT32) == c) {
11958 int32_t v{0};
11959 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(int32_t));
11960 v = static_cast<int32_t>(be32toh(v));
11961 retVal = static_cast<int64_t>(v);
11962 } else if (static_cast<int8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT64) == c) {
11963 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&retVal), sizeof(int64_t));
11964 retVal = static_cast<int64_t>(be64toh(retVal));
11965 }
11966 }
11967 }
11968 return retVal;
11969}
11970
11971inline std::string FromMsgPackVisitor::readString(std::istream &in) noexcept {
11972 std::string retVal{""};
11973 if (in.good()) {
11974 uint8_t c = static_cast<uint8_t>(in.get());
11975 if (MsgPackConstants::STR_FORMAT == getFormatFamily(c)) {
11976 uint32_t length{0};
11977 const uint8_t T = static_cast<uint8_t>(c);
11978 if ((static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXSTR) <= T) && (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXSTR_END) > T)) {
11979 length = T - static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXSTR);
11980 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR8) == T) {
11981 uint8_t _length{0};
11982 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_length), sizeof(uint8_t));
11983 length = _length;
11984 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR16) == T) {
11985 uint16_t _length{0};
11986 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_length), sizeof(uint16_t));
11987 length = be16toh(_length);
11988 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR32) == T) {
11989 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&length), sizeof(uint32_t));
11990 length = be32toh(length);
11991 }
11992
11993 if (0 < length) {
11994 std::vector<char> buffer;
11995 buffer.reserve(length);
11996#ifdef WIN32
11997 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < static_cast<uint32_t>(length); i++) {
11998 char c;
11999 in.get(c);
12000 buffer.push_back(c);
12001 }
12002#else
12003 in.read(static_cast<char *>(&buffer[0]), static_cast<std::streamsize>(length));
12004#endif
12005 retVal = std::string(buffer.data(), length);
12006 }
12007 }
12008 }
12009 return retVal;
12010}
12011
12012inline std::map<std::string, FromMsgPackVisitor::MsgPackKeyValue> FromMsgPackVisitor::readKeyValues(std::istream &in) noexcept {
12013 std::map<std::string, FromMsgPackVisitor::MsgPackKeyValue> keyValues;
12014 while (in.good()) {
12015 uint8_t c = static_cast<uint8_t>(in.get());
12016 if (MsgPackConstants::MAP_FORMAT == getFormatFamily(c)) {
12017 // First, search for map opening token.
12018 const uint8_t T = static_cast<uint8_t>(c);
12019 uint32_t tokensToRead{0};
12020 if ((static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXMAP) <= T) && (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXMAP_END) > T)) {
12021 tokensToRead = T - static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXMAP);
12022 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::MAP16) == T) {
12023 uint16_t tokens{0};
12024 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&tokens), sizeof(uint16_t));
12025 tokensToRead = be16toh(tokens);
12026 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::MAP32) == T) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12027 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&tokensToRead), sizeof(uint32_t)); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12028 tokensToRead = be32toh(tokensToRead); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12029 }
12030
12031 // Next, read pairs string/value.
12032 while (0 < tokensToRead) {
12033 MsgPackKeyValue entry;
12034 entry.m_key = readString(in);
12035 // Read next byte and determine format family.
12036 c = static_cast<uint8_t>(in.get());
12037 entry.m_formatFamily = getFormatFamily(c);
12038
12039 if (MsgPackConstants::BOOL_FORMAT == entry.m_formatFamily) {
12040 entry.m_value = false;
12041 if (static_cast<uint8_t>(c) == static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::IS_TRUE)) {
12042 entry.m_value = true;
12043 } else if (static_cast<uint8_t>(c) == static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::IS_FALSE)) {
12044 entry.m_value = false;
12045 }
12046 } else if (MsgPackConstants::UINT_FORMAT == entry.m_formatFamily) {
12047 in.unget(); // Last character needs to be put back to process the uints correctly as it might
12048 // contain the value.
12049 entry.m_value = readUint(in);
12050 } else if (MsgPackConstants::INT_FORMAT == entry.m_formatFamily) {
12051 in.unget(); // Last character needs to be put back to process the ints correctly as it might contain
12052 // the value.
12053 entry.m_value = readInt(in);
12054 } else if (MsgPackConstants::FLOAT_FORMAT == entry.m_formatFamily) {
12055 if (static_cast<uint8_t>(c) == static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FLOAT)) {
12056 uint32_t _v{0};
12057 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint32_t));
12058 _v = be32toh(_v);
12059 float v{0.0f};
12060 std::memmove(&v, &_v, sizeof(float));
12061 entry.m_value = v;
12062 }
12063 if (static_cast<uint8_t>(c) == static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::DOUBLE)) {
12064 uint64_t _v{0};
12065 in.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint64_t));
12066 _v = be64toh(_v);
12067 double v{0.0};
12068 std::memmove(&v, &_v, sizeof(double));
12069 entry.m_value = v;
12070 }
12071 } else if (MsgPackConstants::STR_FORMAT == entry.m_formatFamily) {
12072 in.unget(); // Last character needs to be put back to process the string correctly as it might
12073 // encode its length.
12074 entry.m_value = readString(in);
12075 } else if (MsgPackConstants::MAP_FORMAT == entry.m_formatFamily) {
12076 in.unget(); // Last character needs to be put back to process the contained nested map correctly as
12077 // it might encode its length.
12078 entry.m_value = readKeyValues(in);
12079 }
12080
12081 keyValues[entry.m_key] = entry;
12082 tokensToRead--;
12083 }
12084 // Stop processing further tokens (might be handled from outer decoder).
12085 break;
12086 }
12087 }
12088 return keyValues;
12089}
12090
12091inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::decodeFrom(std::istream &in) noexcept {
12092 (void)in;
12093
12094 m_keyValues = readKeyValues(in);
12095}
12096
12097inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
12098 (void)id;
12099 (void)shortName;
12100 (void)longName;
12101}
12102
12103inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
12104
12105inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
12106 (void)id;
12107 (void)typeName;
12108 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12109 try {
12110 v = linb::any_cast<bool>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12111 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12112 }
12113 }
12114}
12115
12116inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
12117 (void)id;
12118 (void)typeName;
12119 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12120 try {
12121 v = linb::any_cast<std::string>(m_keyValues[name].m_value).at(0);
12122 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12123 }
12124 }
12125}
12126
12127inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
12128 (void)id;
12129 (void)typeName;
12130 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12131 try {
12132 v = static_cast<int8_t>(linb::any_cast<int64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12133 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) {
12134 // A positive value was stored.
12135 try {
12136 v = static_cast<int8_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12137 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12138 }
12139 }
12140 }
12141}
12142
12143inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
12144 (void)id;
12145 (void)typeName;
12146 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12147 try {
12148 v = static_cast<uint8_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12149 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12150 }
12151 }
12152}
12153
12154inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
12155 (void)id;
12156 (void)typeName;
12157 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12158 try {
12159 v = static_cast<int16_t>(linb::any_cast<int64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12160 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) {
12161 // A positive value was stored.
12162 try {
12163 v = static_cast<int16_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12164 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12165 }
12166 }
12167 }
12168}
12169
12170inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
12171 (void)id;
12172 (void)typeName;
12173 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12174 try {
12175 v = static_cast<uint16_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12176 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12177 }
12178 }
12179}
12180
12181inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
12182 (void)id;
12183 (void)typeName;
12184 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12185 try {
12186 v = static_cast<int32_t>(linb::any_cast<int64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12187 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) {
12188 // A positive value was stored.
12189 try {
12190 v = static_cast<int32_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12191 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12192 }
12193 }
12194 }
12195}
12196
12197inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
12198 (void)id;
12199 (void)typeName;
12200 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12201 try {
12202 v = static_cast<uint32_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12203 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12204 }
12205 }
12206}
12207
12208inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
12209 (void)id;
12210 (void)typeName;
12211 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12212 try {
12213 v = linb::any_cast<int64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12214 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) {
12215 // A positive value was stored.
12216 try {
12217 v = static_cast<int64_t>(linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12218 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12219 }
12220 }
12221 }
12222}
12223
12224inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
12225 (void)id;
12226 (void)typeName;
12227 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12228 try {
12229 v = linb::any_cast<uint64_t>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12230 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12231 }
12232 }
12233}
12234
12235inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
12236 (void)id;
12237 (void)typeName;
12238 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12239 try {
12240 v = linb::any_cast<float>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12241 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12242 }
12243 }
12244}
12245
12246inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
12247 (void)id;
12248 (void)typeName;
12249 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12250 try {
12251 v = linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12252 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12253 }
12254 }
12255}
12256
12257inline void FromMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
12258 (void)id;
12259 (void)typeName;
12260 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12261 try {
12262 v = linb::any_cast<std::string>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12263 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12264 }
12265 }
12266}
12267
12268} // namespace cluon
12269/*
12270 * Copyright (C) 2017-2019 Christian Berger
12271 *
12272 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
12273 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
12274 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
12275 */
12276
12277//#include "cluon/FromJSONVisitor.hpp"
12278//#include "cluon/stringtoolbox.hpp"
12279
12280#include <algorithm>
12281#include <array>
12282#include <cstring>
12283#include <iterator>
12284#include <regex>
12285#include <sstream>
12286#include <vector>
12287
12288#include <iostream>
12289namespace cluon {
12290
12291inline FromJSONVisitor::FromJSONVisitor() noexcept
12292 : m_keyValues{m_data} {}
12293
12294inline FromJSONVisitor::FromJSONVisitor(std::map<std::string, FromJSONVisitor::JSONKeyValue> &preset) noexcept
12295 : m_keyValues{preset} {}
12296
12297inline std::map<std::string, FromJSONVisitor::JSONKeyValue> FromJSONVisitor::readKeyValues(std::string &input) noexcept {
12298 const std::string MATCH_JSON
12299 = R"((?:\"|\')(?:[^"]*)(?:\"|\')(?=:)(?:\:\s*)(?:\"|\')?(?:true|false|[\-]{0,1}[0-9]+[\.][0-9]+|[\-]{0,1}[0-9]+|[0-9a-zA-Z\+\-\,\.\$\ \=]*)(?:\"|\')?)";
12300
12301 std::map<std::string, FromJSONVisitor::JSONKeyValue> result;
12302 std::string oldInput;
12303 try {
12304 std::smatch m;
12305 do {
12306 std::regex_search(input, m, std::regex(MATCH_JSON));
12307
12308 if (m.size() > 0) {
12309 std::string match{m[0]};
12310 std::vector<std::string> retVal = stringtoolbox::split(match, ':');
12311 if ( (retVal.size() == 2) && (stringtoolbox::trim(retVal[1]).size() == 0) ) {
12312 std::string keyOfNestedObject{stringtoolbox::trim(retVal[0])};
12313 keyOfNestedObject = stringtoolbox::split(keyOfNestedObject, '"')[1];
12314 {
12315 std::string suffix(m.suffix());
12316 suffix = stringtoolbox::trim(suffix);
12317 oldInput = input;
12318 input = suffix;
12319 }
12320
12321 auto mapOfNestedValues = readKeyValues(input);
12322
12323 JSONKeyValue kv;
12324 kv.m_key = keyOfNestedObject;
12325 kv.m_type = JSONConstants::OBJECT;
12326 kv.m_value = mapOfNestedValues;
12327
12328 result[keyOfNestedObject] = kv;
12329 }
12330 if ( (retVal.size() == 2) && (stringtoolbox::trim(retVal[1]).size() > 0) ) {
12331 auto e = std::make_pair(stringtoolbox::trim(retVal[0]), stringtoolbox::trim(retVal[1]));
12332
12333 JSONKeyValue kv;
12334 kv.m_key = stringtoolbox::split(e.first, '"')[1];
12335
12336 if ((e.second.size() > 0) && (e.second.at(0) == '"')) {
12337 kv.m_type = JSONConstants::STRING;
12338 kv.m_value = std::string(e.second).substr(1);
12339 } else if ((e.second.size() > 0) && ((e.second == "false") || (e.second == "true"))) {
12340 kv.m_type = (e.second == "true" ? JSONConstants::IS_TRUE : JSONConstants::IS_FALSE);
12341 kv.m_value = e.second == "true";
12342 } else {
12343 kv.m_type = JSONConstants::NUMBER;
12344 std::stringstream tmp(e.second);
12345 double v;
12346 tmp >> v;
12347 kv.m_value = v;
12348 }
12349
12350 result[kv.m_key] = kv;
12351
12352 {
12353 std::string suffix(m.suffix());
12354 suffix = stringtoolbox::trim(suffix);
12355 oldInput = input;
12356 input = suffix;
12357 if (suffix.size() > 0 && suffix.at(0) == '}') {
12358 break; // Nested payload complete; return.
12359 }
12360 }
12361 }
12362 }
12363 } while (!m.empty() && (oldInput != input));
12364 } catch (std::regex_error &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12365 } catch (std::bad_cast &) {} // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12366
12367 return result;
12368}
12369
12370inline void FromJSONVisitor::decodeFrom(std::istream &in) noexcept {
12371 m_keyValues.clear();
12372
12373 std::string s;
12374 std::istream_iterator<char> it(in), it_end;
12375 std::copy(it, it_end, std::insert_iterator<std::string>(s, s.begin()));
12376
12377 // Remove whitespace characters like newline, carriage return, or tab.
12378 s.erase(std::remove_if(s.begin(), s.end(), [](char c) { return (c == '\r' || c == '\t' || c == '\n'); }), s.end());
12379
12380 // Parse JSON from in.
12381 m_keyValues = readKeyValues(s);
12382}
12383
12384inline std::string FromJSONVisitor::decodeBase64(const std::string &input) noexcept {
12385 const std::string ALPHABET{"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/"};
12386 uint8_t counter{0};
12387 std::array<char, 4> buffer;
12388 std::string decoded;
12389 for (uint32_t i{0}; i < input.size(); i++) {
12390 char c;
12391 for (c = 0; c < 64 && (ALPHABET.at(static_cast<uint8_t>(c)) != input.at(i)); c++) {}
12392
12393 buffer[counter++] = c;
12394 if (4 == counter) {
12395 decoded.push_back(static_cast<char>((buffer[0] << 2) + (buffer[1] >> 4)));
12396 if (64 != buffer[2]) {
12397 decoded.push_back(static_cast<char>((buffer[1] << 4) + (buffer[2] >> 2)));
12398 }
12399 if (64 != buffer[3]) {
12400 decoded.push_back(static_cast<char>((buffer[2] << 6) + buffer[3]));
12401 }
12402 counter = 0;
12403 }
12404 }
12405 return decoded;
12406}
12407
12408inline void FromJSONVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
12409 (void)id;
12410 (void)shortName;
12411 (void)longName;
12412}
12413
12414inline void FromJSONVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
12415
12416inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
12417 (void)id;
12418 (void)typeName;
12419 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12420 try {
12421 if (JSONConstants::IS_FALSE == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12422 v = false;
12423 } else if (JSONConstants::IS_TRUE == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12424 v = true;
12425 } else if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12426 v = (1 == static_cast<uint32_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value)));
12427 }
12428 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12429 }
12430 }
12431}
12432
12433inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
12434 (void)id;
12435 (void)typeName;
12436 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12437 try {
12438 if (JSONConstants::STRING == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12439 v = linb::any_cast<std::string>(m_keyValues[name].m_value).at(0);
12440 }
12441 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12442 }
12443 }
12444}
12445
12446inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
12447 (void)id;
12448 (void)typeName;
12449 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12450 try {
12451 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12452 v = static_cast<int8_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12453 }
12454 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12455 }
12456 }
12457}
12458
12459inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
12460 (void)id;
12461 (void)typeName;
12462 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12463 try {
12464 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12465 v = static_cast<uint8_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12466 }
12467 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12468 }
12469 }
12470}
12471
12472inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
12473 (void)id;
12474 (void)typeName;
12475 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12476 try {
12477 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {

12479 }
12480 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12481 }
12482 }
12483}
12484
12485inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
12486 (void)id;
12487 (void)typeName;
12488 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12489 try {
12490 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12491 v = static_cast<uint16_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12492 }
12493 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12494 }
12495 }
12496}
12497
12498inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
12499 (void)id;
12500 (void)typeName;
12501 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12502 try {
12503 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12504 v = static_cast<int32_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12505 }
12506 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12507 }
12508 }
12509}
12510
12511inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
12512 (void)id;
12513 (void)typeName;
12514 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12515 try {
12516 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12517 v = static_cast<uint32_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12518 }
12519 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12520 }
12521 }
12522}
12523
12524inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
12525 (void)id;
12526 (void)typeName;
12527 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12528 try {
12529 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12530 v = static_cast<int64_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12531 }
12532 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12533 }
12534 }
12535}
12536
12537inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
12538 (void)id;
12539 (void)typeName;
12540 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12541 try {
12542 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12543 v = static_cast<uint64_t>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12544 }
12545 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12546 }
12547 }
12548}
12549
12550inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
12551 (void)id;
12552 (void)typeName;
12553 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12554 try {
12555 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12556 v = static_cast<float>(linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value));
12557 }
12558 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12559 }
12560 }
12561}
12562
12563inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
12564 (void)id;
12565 (void)typeName;
12566 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12567 try {
12568 if (JSONConstants::NUMBER == m_keyValues[name].m_type) {
12569 v = linb::any_cast<double>(m_keyValues[name].m_value);
12570 }
12571 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12572 }
12573 }
12574}
12575
12576inline void FromJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
12577 (void)id;
12578 (void)typeName;
12579 if (0 < m_keyValues.count(name)) {
12580 try {
12581 std::string tmp{linb::any_cast<std::string>(m_keyValues[name].m_value)};
12582 v = FromJSONVisitor::decodeBase64(tmp);
12583 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12584 }
12585 }
12586}

12598

12601#include <regex>
12602
12603namespace cluon {
12604
12605inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
12606 (void)longName;
12607 m_metaMessage.messageIdentifier(id).messageName(shortName);
12608 if (!longName.empty()) {
12609 const auto pos = longName.rfind(shortName);
12610 if (std::string::npos != pos) {
12611 m_metaMessage.packageName(longName.substr(0, pos - 1));
12612 }
12613 }
12614}
12615
12616inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
12617
12618inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
12619 cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField mf;
12620 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::BOOL_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);
12621 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[mf.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{v};
12622 m_metaMessage.add(std::move(mf));
12623}
12624
12625inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
12626 cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField mf;
12627 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::CHAR_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);
12628 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[mf.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{v};
12629 m_metaMessage.add(std::move(mf));
12630}
12631
12632inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
12633 cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField mf;
12634 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::INT8_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);
12635 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[mf.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{v};
12636 m_metaMessage.add(std::move(mf));
12637}
12638

12640 cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField mf;
12641 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::UINT8_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);
12642 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[mf.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{v};
12643 m_metaMessage.add(std::move(mf));
12644}

12690 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::FLOAT_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);

12695inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
12696 cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField mf;
12697 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::DOUBLE_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);
12698 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[mf.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{v};

12702inline void GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
12703 cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField mf;
12704 mf.fieldIdentifier(id).fieldDataType(cluon::MetaMessage::MetaField::STRING_T).fieldDataTypeName(typeName).fieldName(name);
12705 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[mf.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{v};
12706 m_metaMessage.add(std::move(mf));
12707}
12708
12709inline MetaMessage GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::metaMessage() const noexcept {
12710 return m_metaMessage;
12711}
12712
12713inline std::unordered_map<uint32_t, linb::any, UseUInt32ValueAsHashKey> GenericMessage::GenericMessageVisitor::intermediateDataRepresentation() const noexcept {
12714 return m_intermediateDataRepresentation;
12715}
12716
12718
12719inline int32_t GenericMessage::ID() {
12720 return m_metaMessage.messageIdentifier();
12721}
12722
12723inline const std::string GenericMessage::ShortName() {
12724 std::string tmp{LongName()};
12725 std::replace(tmp.begin(), tmp.end(), '.', ' ');
12726 std::istringstream sstr{tmp};
12727 std::vector<std::string> tokens{std::istream_iterator<std::string>(sstr), std::istream_iterator<std::string>()};
12728
12729 return tokens.back();
12730}
12731
12732inline const std::string GenericMessage::LongName() {
12733 return m_metaMessage.packageName() + (!m_metaMessage.packageName().empty() ? "." : "") + m_metaMessage.messageName();
12734}
12735
12736inline void GenericMessage::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
12737 (void)id;
12738 (void)shortName;
12739 (void)longName;
12740}
12741
12742inline void GenericMessage::postVisit() noexcept {}
12743
12744inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
12745 (void)typeName;
12746 (void)name;
12747 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12748 try {
12749 v = linb::any_cast<bool>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12750 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12751 }
12752 }
12753}
12754
12755inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
12756 (void)typeName;
12757 (void)name;
12758 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12759 try {
12760 v = linb::any_cast<char>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12761 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12762 }
12763 }
12764}
12765
12766inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
12767 (void)typeName;
12768 (void)name;
12769 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12770 try {
12771 v = linb::any_cast<int8_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12772 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12773 }
12774 }
12775}
12776
12777inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
12778 (void)typeName;
12779 (void)name;
12780 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12781 try {
12782 v = linb::any_cast<uint8_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12783 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12784 }
12785 }
12786}
12787
12788inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
12789 (void)typeName;
12790 (void)name;
12791 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12792 try {
12793 v = linb::any_cast<int16_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12794 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12795 }
12796 }
12797}
12798
12799inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
12800 (void)typeName;
12801 (void)name;
12802 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12803 try {
12804 v = linb::any_cast<uint16_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12805 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12806 }
12807 }
12808}
12809
12810inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
12811 (void)typeName;
12812 (void)name;
12813 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12814 try {
12815 v = linb::any_cast<int32_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12816 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12817 }
12818 }
12819}
12820
12821inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
12822 (void)typeName;
12823 (void)name;
12824 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12825 try {
12826 v = linb::any_cast<uint32_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12827 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12828 }
12829 }
12830}
12831
12832inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
12833 (void)typeName;
12834 (void)name;
12835 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12836 try {
12837 v = linb::any_cast<int64_t>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12838 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12839 }
12840 }
12841}
12842
12843inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
12844 (void)typeName;

12849 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12850 }
12851 }

12854inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {

12856 (void)name;

12863}
12864
12865inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
