12871 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12872 }
12873 }
12874}
12875
12876inline void GenericMessage::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
12877 (void)typeName;
12878 (void)name;
12879 if (0 < m_intermediateDataRepresentation.count(id)) {
12880 try {
12881 v = linb::any_cast<std::string>(m_intermediateDataRepresentation[id]);
12882 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12883 }
12884 }
12885}
12886
12888
12889inline void GenericMessage::createFrom(const MetaMessage &mm, const std::vector<MetaMessage> &mms) noexcept {
12890 m_metaMessage = mm;
12891 m_longName = m_metaMessage.messageName();
12892
12893 m_scopeOfMetaMessages.clear();
12894 m_scopeOfMetaMessages = mms;
12895
12896 m_mapForScopeOfMetaMessages.clear();
12897 for (const auto &e : m_scopeOfMetaMessages) { m_mapForScopeOfMetaMessages[e.messageName()] = e; }
12898
12899 m_intermediateDataRepresentation.clear();
12900 for (const auto &f : m_metaMessage.listOfMetaFields()) {
12901 if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::BOOL_T) {
12902 try {
12903 linb::any _v{false};
12904 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12905 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12906 }
12907 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::CHAR_T) {
12908 try {
12909 linb::any _v{static_cast<char>('\0')};
12910 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12911 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12912 }
12913 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::UINT8_T) {
12914 try {
12915 linb::any _v{static_cast<uint8_t>(0)};
12916 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12917 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12918 }
12919 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::INT8_T) {
12920 try {
12921 linb::any _v{static_cast<int8_t>(0)};
12922 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12923 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12924 }
12925 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::UINT16_T) {
12926 try {
12927 linb::any _v{static_cast<uint16_t>(0)};
12928 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12929 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12930 }
12931 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::INT16_T) {
12932 try {
12933 linb::any _v{static_cast<int16_t>(0)};
12934 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12935 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12936 }
12937 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::UINT32_T) {
12938 try {
12939 linb::any _v{static_cast<uint32_t>(0)};
12940 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12941 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12942 }
12943 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::INT32_T) {
12944 try {
12945 linb::any _v{static_cast<int32_t>(0)};
12946 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12947 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12948 }
12949 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::UINT64_T) {
12950 try {
12951 linb::any _v{static_cast<uint64_t>(0)};
12952 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12953 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12954 }
12955 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::INT64_T) {
12956 try {
12957 linb::any _v{static_cast<int64_t>(0)};
12958 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12959 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12960 }
12961 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::FLOAT_T) {
12962 try {
12963 linb::any _v{static_cast<float>(0.0f)};
12964 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12965 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12966 }
12967 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::DOUBLE_T) {
12968 try {
12969 linb::any _v{static_cast<double>(0.0)};
12970 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12971 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12972 }
12973 } else if ((f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::STRING_T) || (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::BYTES_T)) {
12974 try {
12975 linb::any _v = std::string{};
12976 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = _v;
12977 } catch (const linb::bad_any_cast &) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
12978 }
12979 } else if (f.fieldDataType() == MetaMessage::MetaField::MESSAGE_T) {
12980 if (0 < m_mapForScopeOfMetaMessages.count(f.fieldDataTypeName())) {
12981 // Create a GenericMessage from the decoded Proto-data.
12982 cluon::GenericMessage gm;
12983 gm.createFrom(m_mapForScopeOfMetaMessages[f.fieldDataTypeName()], m_scopeOfMetaMessages);
12984
12985 m_intermediateDataRepresentation[f.fieldIdentifier()] = linb::any{gm};
12986 }
12987 }
12988 }
12989}
12990
12991} // namespace cluon
12992/*
12993 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
12994 *
12995 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
12996 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
12997 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
12998 */
12999
13000//#include "cluon/ToJSONVisitor.hpp"
13001
13002#include <iomanip>
13003#include <sstream>
13004
13005namespace cluon {
13006
13007inline ToJSONVisitor::ToJSONVisitor(bool withOuterCurlyBraces, const std::map<uint32_t, bool> &mask) noexcept
13008 : m_withOuterCurlyBraces(withOuterCurlyBraces)
13009 , m_mask(mask) {}
13010
13011inline std::string ToJSONVisitor::json() const noexcept {
13012 const std::string tmp{m_buffer.str()};
13013 std::string retVal{"{}"};
13014 if (2 < tmp.size()) {
13015 retVal = {(m_withOuterCurlyBraces ? "{" : "") + tmp.substr(0, tmp.size() - 2) + (m_withOuterCurlyBraces ? "}" : "")};
13016 }
13017 return retVal;
13018}
13019
13020inline void ToJSONVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
13021 (void)id;
13022 (void)longName;
13023 (void)shortName;
13024}
13025
13026inline void ToJSONVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
13027
13028inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
13029 (void)typeName;
13030 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13031 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << v << ',' << '\n';
13032 }
13033}
13034
13035inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
13036 (void)typeName;
13037 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13038 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << '\"' << v << '\"' << ',' << '\n';
13039 }
13040}
13041
13042inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
13043 (void)typeName;
13044 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13045 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << +v << ',' << '\n';
13046 }
13047}
13048
13049inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
13050 (void)typeName;
13051 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13052 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << +v << ',' << '\n';
13053 }
13054}
13055
13056inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
13057 (void)typeName;
13058 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13059 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << +v << ',' << '\n';
13060 }
13061}
13062
13063inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
13064 (void)typeName;
13065 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13066 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << +v << ',' << '\n';
13067 }
13068}
13069
13070inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
13071 (void)typeName;
13072 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13073 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << v << ',' << '\n';
13074 }
13075}
13076
13077inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
13078 (void)typeName;
13079 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13080 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << v << ',' << '\n';
13081 }
13082}
13083
13084inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
13085 (void)typeName;
13086 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13087 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << v << ',' << '\n';
13088 }
13089}
13090
13091inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
13092 (void)typeName;
13093 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13094 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << v << ',' << '\n';
13095 }
13096}
13097
13098inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
13099 (void)typeName;
13100 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13101 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << std::setprecision(7) << v << std::setprecision(6) << ',' << '\n';
13102 }
13103}
13104
13105inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
13106 (void)typeName;
13107 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13108 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << std::setprecision(11) << v << std::setprecision(6) << ',' << '\n';
13109 }
13110}
13111
13112inline void ToJSONVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
13113 (void)typeName;
13114 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13115 m_buffer << '\"' << name << '\"' << ':' << '\"' << ToJSONVisitor::encodeBase64(v) << '\"' << ',' << '\n';
13116 }
13117}
13118
13119inline std::string ToJSONVisitor::encodeBase64(const std::string &input) noexcept {
13120 std::string retVal;
13121
13122 const std::string ALPHABET{"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/"};
13123 auto length{input.length()};
13124 uint32_t index{0};
13125 uint32_t value{0};
13126
13127 while (length > 2) {
13128 value = static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<unsigned char>(input.at(index++))) << 16;
13129 value |= static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<unsigned char>(input.at(index++))) << 8;
13130 value |= static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<unsigned char>(input.at(index++)));
13131 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0xFC0000) >> 18);
13132 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0x3F000) >> 12);
13133 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0xFC0) >> 6);
13134 retVal += ALPHABET.at(value & 0x3F);
13135 length -= 3;
13136 }
13137 if (length == 2) {
13138 value = static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<unsigned char>(input.at(index++))) << 16;
13139 value |= static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<unsigned char>(input.at(index++))) << 8;
13140 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0xFC0000) >> 18);
13141 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0x3F000) >> 12);
13142 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0xFC0) >> 6);
13143 retVal += "=";
13144 } else if (length == 1) {
13145 value = static_cast<uint32_t>(static_cast<unsigned char>(input.at(index++))) << 16;
13146 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0xFC0000) >> 18);
13147 retVal += ALPHABET.at((value & 0x3F000) >> 12);
13148 retVal += "==";
13149 }
13150
13151 return retVal;
13152}
13153
13154} // namespace cluon
13155/*
13156 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
13157 *
13158 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
13159 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
13160 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
13161 */
13162
13163//#include "cluon/ToCSVVisitor.hpp"
13164//#include "cluon/ToJSONVisitor.hpp"
13165
13166#include <iomanip>
13167#include <sstream>
13168
13169namespace cluon {
13170
13171inline ToCSVVisitor::ToCSVVisitor(char delimiter, bool withHeader, const std::map<uint32_t, bool> &mask) noexcept
13172 : m_mask(mask)
13173 , m_prefix("")
13174 , m_delimiter(delimiter)
13175 , m_withHeader(withHeader)
13176 , m_isNested(false) {}
13177
13178inline ToCSVVisitor::ToCSVVisitor(const std::string &prefix, char delimiter, bool withHeader, bool isNested) noexcept
13179 : m_prefix(prefix)
13180 , m_delimiter(delimiter)
13181 , m_withHeader(withHeader)
13182 , m_isNested(isNested) {}
13183
13184inline void ToCSVVisitor::clear() noexcept {
13185 m_bufferHeader.str("");
13186 m_bufferValues.str("");
13187 m_fillHeader = true;
13188}
13189
13190inline std::string ToCSVVisitor::csv() const noexcept {
13191 std::stringstream tmp;
13192 if (m_withHeader) {
13193 tmp << m_bufferHeader.str();
13194 }
13195 tmp << m_bufferValues.str();
13196 const std::string retVal{tmp.str()};
13197 return retVal;
13198}
13199
13200inline void ToCSVVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
13201 (void)id;
13202 (void)shortName;
13203 (void)longName;
13204}
13205
13206inline void ToCSVVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {
13207 if (m_fillHeader) {
13208 m_bufferHeader << (m_isNested ? "" : "\n");
13209 }
13210 m_fillHeader = false;
13211 m_bufferValues << (m_isNested ? "" : "\n");
13212}
13213
13214inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
13215 (void)typeName;
13216 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13217 if (m_fillHeader) {
13218 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13219 }
13220 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13221 }
13222}
13223
13224inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
13225 (void)typeName;
13226 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13227 if (m_fillHeader) {
13228 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13229 }
13230 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13231 }
13232}
13233
13234inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
13235 (void)typeName;
13236 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13237 if (m_fillHeader) {
13238 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13239 }
13240 m_bufferValues << +v << m_delimiter;
13241 }
13242}
13243
13244inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
13245 (void)typeName;
13246 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13247 if (m_fillHeader) {
13248 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13249 }
13250 m_bufferValues << +v << m_delimiter;
13251 }
13252}
13253
13254inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
13255 (void)typeName;
13256 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13257 if (m_fillHeader) {
13258 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13259 }
13260 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13261 }
13262}
13263
13264inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
13265 (void)typeName;
13266 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13267 if (m_fillHeader) {
13268 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13269 }
13270 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13271 }
13272}
13273
13274inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
13275 (void)typeName;
13276 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13277 if (m_fillHeader) {
13278 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13279 }
13280 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13281 }
13282}
13283
13284inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
13285 (void)typeName;
13286 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13287 if (m_fillHeader) {
13288 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13289 }
13290 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13291 }
13292}
13293
13294inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
13295 (void)typeName;
13296 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13297 if (m_fillHeader) {
13298 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13299 }
13300 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13301 }
13302}
13303
13304inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
13305 (void)typeName;
13306 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13307 if (m_fillHeader) {
13308 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13309 }
13310 m_bufferValues << v << m_delimiter;
13311 }
13312}
13313
13314inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
13315 (void)typeName;
13316 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13317 if (m_fillHeader) {
13318 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13319 }
13320 m_bufferValues << std::setprecision(7) << v << std::setprecision(6) << m_delimiter;
13321 }
13322}
13323
13324inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
13325 (void)typeName;
13326 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13327 if (m_fillHeader) {
13328 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13329 }
13330 m_bufferValues << std::setprecision(11) << v << std::setprecision(6) << m_delimiter;
13331 }
13332}
13333
13334inline void ToCSVVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
13335 (void)typeName;
13336 if ((0 == m_mask.count(id)) || m_mask[id]) {
13337 if (m_fillHeader) {
13338 m_bufferHeader << m_prefix << (!m_prefix.empty() ? "." : "") << name << m_delimiter;
13339 }
13340 m_bufferValues << '\"' << cluon::ToJSONVisitor::encodeBase64(v) << '\"' << m_delimiter;
13341 }
13342}
13343
13344} // namespace cluon

13346 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
13347 *
13348 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
13349 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
13350 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
13351 */

13353// clang-format off
13354#ifdef WIN32
13355 #include <Winsock2.h> // for htonll
13356#endif
13357// clang-format on
13358
13359//#include "cluon/ToLCMVisitor.hpp"
13360
13361#include <cstring>
13362
13363namespace cluon {
13364
13365inline std::string ToLCMVisitor::encodedData(bool withHash) const noexcept {
13366 int64_t _hash = hash();
13367 _hash = static_cast<int64_t>(htobe64(_hash));
13368
13369 std::stringstream hashBuffer;
13370 hashBuffer.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_hash), sizeof(int64_t));
13371
13372 const std::string s{(withHash ? hashBuffer.str() : "") + m_buffer.str()};
13373 return s;
13374}
13375
13377
13378inline void ToLCMVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
13379 (void)id;
13380 (void)shortName;
13381 (void)longName;
13382}
13383
13384inline void ToLCMVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
13385
13386inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
13387 (void)id;
13388 (void)typeName;
13389 calculateHash(name);
13390 calculateHash("boolean");
13391 calculateHash(0);
13392 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(bool));
13393}
13394
13395inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
13396 (void)id;
13397 (void)typeName;
13398 calculateHash(name);
13399 calculateHash("int8_t");
13400 calculateHash(0);
13401 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(char));
13402}
13403
13404inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
13405 (void)id;
13406 (void)typeName;
13407 calculateHash(name);
13408 calculateHash("int8_t");
13409 calculateHash(0);
13410 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(int8_t));
13411}
13412
13413inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
13414 (void)id;
13415 (void)typeName;
13416 calculateHash(name);
13417 calculateHash("int8_t");
13418 calculateHash(0);
13419 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13420}
13421
13422inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
13423 (void)id;
13424 (void)typeName;
13425 calculateHash(name);
13426 calculateHash("int16_t");
13427 calculateHash(0);
13428 int16_t _v = static_cast<int16_t>(htobe16(v));
13429 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int16_t));
13430}
13431
13432inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
13433 (void)id;
13434 (void)typeName;
13435 calculateHash(name);
13436 calculateHash("int16_t");
13437 calculateHash(0);

13439 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int16_t));
13440}
13441
13442inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
13443 (void)id;
13444 (void)typeName;
13445 calculateHash(name);
13446 calculateHash("int32_t");
13447 calculateHash(0);
13448 int32_t _v = static_cast<int32_t>(htobe32(v));
13449 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
13450}
13451
13452inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
13453 (void)id;
13454 (void)typeName;
13455 calculateHash(name);
13456 calculateHash("int32_t");
13457 calculateHash(0);
13458 int32_t _v = static_cast<int32_t>(htobe32(v));
13459 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
13460}
13461
13462inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
13463 (void)id;
13464 (void)typeName;
13465 calculateHash(name);
13466 calculateHash("int64_t");
13467 calculateHash(0);
13468 int64_t _v = static_cast<int64_t>(htobe64(v));
13469 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
13470}
13471
13472inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
13473 (void)id;
13474 (void)typeName;
13475 calculateHash(name);
13476 calculateHash("int64_t");
13477 calculateHash(0);
13478 int64_t _v = static_cast<int64_t>(htobe64(v));
13479 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
13480}
13481
13482inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
13483 (void)id;
13484 (void)typeName;
13485 calculateHash(name);
13486 calculateHash("float");
13487 calculateHash(0);
13488 int32_t _v{0};
13489 std::memmove(&_v, &v, sizeof(int32_t));
13490 _v = static_cast<int32_t>(htobe32(_v));
13491 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
13492}
13493
13494inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
13495 (void)id;
13496 (void)typeName;
13497 calculateHash(name);
13498 calculateHash("double");
13499 calculateHash(0);
13500 int64_t _v{0};
13501 std::memmove(&_v, &v, sizeof(int64_t));
13502 _v = static_cast<int64_t>(htobe64(_v));
13503 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
13504}
13505
13506inline void ToLCMVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
13507 (void)id;
13508 (void)typeName;
13509 calculateHash(name);
13510 calculateHash("string");
13511 calculateHash(0);
13512
13513 const std::size_t LENGTH = v.length();
13514 int32_t _v = static_cast<int32_t>(htobe32(static_cast<uint32_t>(LENGTH + 1)));
13515 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
13516 m_buffer.write(v.c_str(), static_cast<std::streamsize>(LENGTH)); // LENGTH won't be negative.
13517 m_buffer << '\0';
13518}
13519
13521
13522inline int64_t ToLCMVisitor::hash() const noexcept {
13523 // Apply ZigZag encoding for hash from this message's fields and depending
13524 // hashes for complex nested types.
13525 int64_t tmp{m_hash};
13526 for (int64_t v : m_hashes) { tmp += v; }
13527
13528 const int64_t hash = (tmp << 1) + ((tmp >> 63) & 1);
13529 return hash;
13530}
13531
13532inline void ToLCMVisitor::calculateHash(char c) noexcept {
13533 m_hash = ((m_hash << 8) ^ (m_hash >> 55)) + c;
13534}
13535
13536inline void ToLCMVisitor::calculateHash(const std::string &s) noexcept {
13537 const std::string tmp{(s.length() > 255 ? s.substr(0, 255) : s)};
13538 const uint8_t length{static_cast<uint8_t>(tmp.length())};
13539 calculateHash(static_cast<char>(length));
13540 for (auto c : s) { calculateHash(c); }
13541}
13542
13543} // namespace cluon
13544/*
13545 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
13546 *
13547 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
13548 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
13549 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
13550 */
13551
13552//#include "cluon/LCMToGenericMessage.hpp"
13553//#include "cluon/FromLCMVisitor.hpp"
13554//#include "cluon/MessageParser.hpp"
13555
13556#include <array>
13557#include <iostream>
13558#include <sstream>
13559
13560// clang-format off
13561#ifdef WIN32
13562 #undef be32toh
13563 #define be32toh(x) __ntohl(x)
13564
13565 #include <cstdint>
13566 #include <cstring>
13567 uint32_t __ntohl(const uint32_t v) {
13568 uint8_t d[4] = {};
13569 std::memmove(&d, &v, sizeof(d));
13570
13571 return ((uint32_t) d[3] << 0)
13572 | ((uint32_t) d[2] << 8)
13573 | ((uint32_t) d[1] << 16)
13574 | ((uint32_t) d[0] << 24);
13575 }
13576#endif
13577// clang-format on
13578
13579namespace cluon {
13580
13581inline int32_t LCMToGenericMessage::setMessageSpecification(const std::string &ms) noexcept {
13582 int32_t retVal{-1};
13583
13584 m_listOfMetaMessages.clear();
13585 m_scopeOfMetaMessages.clear();
13586
13587 cluon::MessageParser mp;
13588 auto parsingResult = mp.parse(ms);
13589 if (cluon::MessageParser::MessageParserErrorCodes::NO_MESSAGEPARSER_ERROR == parsingResult.second) {
13590 m_listOfMetaMessages = parsingResult.first;
13591 for (const auto &mm : m_listOfMetaMessages) { m_scopeOfMetaMessages[mm.messageName()] = mm; }
13592 retVal = static_cast<int32_t>(m_listOfMetaMessages.size());
13593 }
13594 return retVal;
13595}
13596
13597inline cluon::GenericMessage LCMToGenericMessage::getGenericMessage(const std::string &data) noexcept {
13598 cluon::GenericMessage gm;
13599
13600 if (!m_listOfMetaMessages.empty()) {
13601 constexpr uint8_t LCM_HEADER_SIZE{4 /*magic number*/ + 4 /*sequence number*/ + 1 /*'\0' after channel name*/};
13602 if (LCM_HEADER_SIZE < data.size()) {
13603 // First, read magic number.
13604 constexpr uint32_t MAGIC_NUMBER_LCM2{0x4c433032};
13605 uint32_t offset{0};
13606 uint32_t magicNumber{0};
13607 {
13608 std::stringstream sstr{std::string(&data[offset], 4)};
13609 // clang-format off
13610 sstr.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&magicNumber), sizeof(uint32_t)); /* Flawfinder: ignore */ // NOLINT
13611 // clang-format on
13612 magicNumber = be32toh(magicNumber);
13613 }
13614 if (MAGIC_NUMBER_LCM2 == magicNumber) {
13615 offset += 4;
13616
13617 // Next, read sequence number in case of fragmented data.
13618 uint32_t sequenceNumber{0};
13619 {
13620 std::stringstream sstr{std::string(&data[offset], 4)};
13621 // clang-format off
13622 sstr.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&sequenceNumber), sizeof(uint32_t)); /* Flawfinder: ignore */ // NOLINT
13623 // clang-format on
13624 sequenceNumber = be32toh(sequenceNumber);
13625 }
13626 // Only support for non-fragmented messages.
13627 if (0 == sequenceNumber) {
13628 offset += 4;
13629
13630 const std::string::size_type START_POSITION = offset;
13631 std::string::size_type pos = data.find('\0', START_POSITION); // Extract channel name.
13632 if (std::string::npos != pos) {
13633 const std::string CHANNEL_NAME(data.substr(START_POSITION, (pos - START_POSITION)));
13634
13635 // Next, find the MetaMessage corresponding to the channel name
13636 // and create a Message therefrom based on the decoded LCM data.
13637 if ((0 < m_scopeOfMetaMessages.count(CHANNEL_NAME)) && (std::string::npos != (pos + 1))) {
13638 // data[offset+i] marks now the beginning of the payload to be decoded.
13639 std::stringstream sstr{data.substr(pos + 1)};
13640
13641 cluon::FromLCMVisitor fromLCM;
13642 fromLCM.decodeFrom(sstr);
13643
13644 gm.createFrom(m_scopeOfMetaMessages[CHANNEL_NAME], m_listOfMetaMessages);
13645 gm.accept(fromLCM);
13646 }
13647 }
13648 }
13649 }
13650 }
13651 }
13652
13653 return gm;
13654}
13655
13656} // namespace cluon
13657/*
13658 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
13659 *
13660 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
13661 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
13662 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
13663 */
13664
13665// clang-format off
13666#ifdef WIN32
13667 #include <Winsock2.h> // for htonl, htons
13668#endif
13669// clang-format on
13670
13671//#include "cluon/ToMsgPackVisitor.hpp"
13672
13673#include <cstring>
13674#include <limits>
13675
13676namespace cluon {
13677
13678inline std::string ToMsgPackVisitor::encodedData() const noexcept {
13679 std::stringstream prefix;
13680 if (m_numberOfFields <= 0xF) {
13681 const uint8_t pairs = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXMAP) | static_cast<uint8_t>(m_numberOfFields);
13682 prefix.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&pairs), sizeof(uint8_t));
13683 } else if ((m_numberOfFields > 0xF) && (m_numberOfFields <= 0xFFFF)) {
13684 const uint8_t pairs = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::MAP16);
13685 prefix.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&pairs), sizeof(uint8_t));
13686 uint16_t n = htobe16(static_cast<uint16_t>(m_numberOfFields));
13687 prefix.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&n), sizeof(uint16_t));
13688 } else if (m_numberOfFields > 0xFFFF) { // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13689 const uint8_t pairs = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::MAP32); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13690 prefix.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&pairs), sizeof(uint8_t)); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13691 uint32_t n = htobe32(static_cast<uint32_t>(m_numberOfFields)); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13692 prefix.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&n), sizeof(uint32_t)); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
13693 }
13694 std::string s{prefix.str() + m_buffer.str()};
13695 return s;
13696}
13697
13698inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::encode(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) {
13699 const uint32_t LENGTH{static_cast<uint32_t>(s.size())};
13700 if (LENGTH < 32) {
13701 const uint8_t v = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FIXSTR) | static_cast<uint8_t>(LENGTH);
13702 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13703 } else if (LENGTH <= 0xFF) {
13704 const uint8_t v = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR8);
13705 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13706 uint8_t len = static_cast<uint8_t>(LENGTH);
13707 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&len), sizeof(uint8_t));
13708 } else if (LENGTH <= 0xFFFF) {
13709 const uint8_t v = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR16);
13710 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13711 uint16_t len = htobe16(static_cast<uint16_t>(LENGTH));
13712 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&len), sizeof(uint16_t));
13713 } else {
13714 const uint8_t v = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::STR32);
13715 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13716 uint32_t len = htobe32(LENGTH);
13717 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&len), sizeof(uint32_t));
13718 }
13719 o.write(s.c_str(), static_cast<std::streamsize>(LENGTH)); // LENGTH won't be negative.
13720}
13721
13722inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::encodeUint(std::ostream &o, uint64_t v) {
13723 if (0x7f >= v) {
13724 const uint8_t _v = static_cast<uint8_t>(v);
13725 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13726 } else if (0xFF >= v) {
13727 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT8);
13728 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13729 const uint8_t _v = static_cast<uint8_t>(v);
13730 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint8_t));
13731 } else if (0xFFFF >= v) {
13732 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT16);
13733 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13734 uint16_t _v = static_cast<uint16_t>(v);
13735 _v = htobe16(_v);
13736 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint16_t));
13737 } else if (0xFFFFFFFF >= v) {
13738 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT32);
13739 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13740 uint32_t _v = static_cast<uint32_t>(v);
13741 _v = htobe32(_v);
13742 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint32_t));
13743 } else {
13744 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::UINT64);
13745 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13746 uint64_t _v = v;
13747 _v = htobe64(_v);
13748 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint64_t));
13749 }
13750}
13751
13752inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::encodeInt(std::ostream &o, int64_t v) {
13753 if (-31 <= v) {
13754 int8_t _v = static_cast<int8_t>(v);
13755 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(int8_t));
13756 } else if (std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::lowest() <= v) {
13757 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT8);
13758 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13759 int8_t _v = static_cast<int8_t>(v);
13760 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(int8_t));
13761 } else if (std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::lowest() <= v) {
13762 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT16);
13763 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13764 int16_t _v = static_cast<int16_t>(v);
13765 _v = static_cast<int16_t>(htobe16(_v));
13766 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(int16_t));
13767 } else if (std::numeric_limits<int32_t>::lowest() <= v) {
13768 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT32);
13769 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13770 int32_t _v = static_cast<int32_t>(v);
13771 _v = static_cast<int32_t>(htobe32(_v));
13772 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(int32_t));
13773 } else {
13774 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::INT64);
13775 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13776 int64_t _v = static_cast<int64_t>(v);
13777 _v = static_cast<int64_t>(htobe64(_v));
13778 o.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(int64_t));
13779 }
13780}
13781
13782inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
13783 (void)id;
13784 (void)shortName;
13785 (void)longName;
13786
13787 m_numberOfFields = 0;
13788 m_buffer.str("");
13789}
13790
13791inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {}
13792
13793inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
13794 (void)id;
13795 (void)typeName;
13796
13797 encode(m_buffer, name);
13798 const uint8_t value = (v ? static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::IS_TRUE) : static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::IS_FALSE));
13799 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&value), sizeof(uint8_t));
13800 m_numberOfFields++;
13801}
13802
13803inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
13804 (void)id;
13805 (void)typeName;
13806
13807 encode(m_buffer, name);
13808 const std::string s(1, v);
13809 encode(m_buffer, s);
13810 m_numberOfFields++;
13811}
13812
13813inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int8_t &v) noexcept {
13814 (void)id;
13815 (void)typeName;
13816
13817 encode(m_buffer, name);
13818 (v < 0) ? encodeInt(m_buffer, v) : encodeUint(m_buffer, static_cast<uint8_t>(v));
13819 m_numberOfFields++;
13820}
13821
13822inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint8_t &v) noexcept {
13823 (void)id;
13824 (void)typeName;
13825
13826 encode(m_buffer, name);
13827 encodeUint(m_buffer, v);
13828 m_numberOfFields++;
13829}
13830
13831inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int16_t &v) noexcept {
13832 (void)id;
13833 (void)typeName;
13834
13835 encode(m_buffer, name);
13836 (v < 0) ? encodeInt(m_buffer, v) : encodeUint(m_buffer, static_cast<uint16_t>(v));
13837 m_numberOfFields++;
13838}
13839
13840inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint16_t &v) noexcept {
13841 (void)id;
13842 (void)typeName;
13843
13844 encode(m_buffer, name);
13845 encodeUint(m_buffer, v);
13846 m_numberOfFields++;
13847}
13848
13849inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int32_t &v) noexcept {
13850 (void)id;
13851 (void)typeName;
13852
13853 encode(m_buffer, name);
13854 (v < 0) ? encodeInt(m_buffer, v) : encodeUint(m_buffer, static_cast<uint32_t>(v));
13855 m_numberOfFields++;
13856}
13857
13858inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint32_t &v) noexcept {
13859 (void)id;
13860 (void)typeName;
13861
13862 encode(m_buffer, name);
13863 encodeUint(m_buffer, v);
13864 m_numberOfFields++;
13865}
13866
13867inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, int64_t &v) noexcept {
13868 (void)id;
13869 (void)typeName;
13870
13871 encode(m_buffer, name);
13872 (v < 0) ? encodeInt(m_buffer, v) : encodeUint(m_buffer, static_cast<uint64_t>(v));
13873 m_numberOfFields++;
13874}
13875
13876inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, uint64_t &v) noexcept {
13877 (void)id;
13878 (void)typeName;
13879
13880 encode(m_buffer, name);
13881 encodeUint(m_buffer, v);
13882 m_numberOfFields++;
13883}
13884
13885inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, float &v) noexcept {
13886 (void)id;
13887 (void)typeName;
13888
13889 encode(m_buffer, name);
13890 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::FLOAT);
13891 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13892 uint32_t _v{0};
13893 std::memmove(&_v, &v, sizeof(float));
13894 _v = htobe32(_v);
13895 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(uint32_t));
13896 m_numberOfFields++;
13897}
13898
13899inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, double &v) noexcept {
13900 (void)id;
13901 (void)typeName;
13902
13903 encode(m_buffer, name);
13904 const uint8_t t = static_cast<uint8_t>(MsgPackConstants::DOUBLE);
13905 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&t), sizeof(uint8_t));
13906 uint64_t _v{0};
13907 std::memmove(&_v, &v, sizeof(double));
13908 _v = htobe64(_v);
13909 m_buffer.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&_v), sizeof(double));
13910 m_numberOfFields++;
13911}
13912
13913inline void ToMsgPackVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, std::string &v) noexcept {
13914 (void)id;
13915 (void)typeName;
13916
13917 encode(m_buffer, name);
13918 encode(m_buffer, v);
13919 m_numberOfFields++;
13920}
13921
13922} // namespace cluon
13923/*
13924 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger
13925 *
13926 * This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
13927 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
13928 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
13929 */
13930
13931//#include "cluon/OD4Session.hpp"
13932//#include "cluon/Envelope.hpp"
13933//#include "cluon/FromProtoVisitor.hpp"
13934//#include "cluon/TerminateHandler.hpp"
13935//#include "cluon/Time.hpp"
13936
13937#include <iostream>
13938#include <sstream>
13939#include <thread>
13940
13941namespace cluon {
13942
13943inline OD4Session::OD4Session(uint16_t CID, std::function<void(cluon::data::Envelope &&envelope)> delegate) noexcept
13944 : m_receiver{nullptr}
13945 , m_sender{"225.0.0." + std::to_string(CID), 12175}
13946 , m_delegate(std::move(delegate))
13947 , m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegatesMutex{}
13948 , m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates{} {
13949 m_receiver = std::make_unique<cluon::UDPReceiver>(
13950 "225.0.0." + std::to_string(CID),
13951 12175,
13952 [this](std::string &&data, std::string &&from, std::chrono::system_clock::time_point &&timepoint) {
13953 this->callback(std::move(data), std::move(from), std::move(timepoint));
13954 },
13955 m_sender.getSendFromPort() /* passing our local send from port to the UDPReceiver to filter out our own bytes */);
13956}
13957
13958inline void OD4Session::timeTrigger(float freq, std::function<bool()> delegate) noexcept {
13959 if (nullptr != delegate) {
13960 bool delegateIsRunning{true};
13961 const int64_t TIME_SLICE_IN_MILLISECONDS{static_cast<uint32_t>(1000 / ((freq > 0) ? freq : 1.0f))};
13962 do {
13963 cluon::data::TimeStamp before{cluon::time::now()};
13964 try {
13965 delegateIsRunning = delegate();
13966 } catch (...) {
13967 delegateIsRunning = false; // delegate threw exception.
13968 }
13969 cluon::data::TimeStamp after{cluon::time::now()};
13970
13971 const int64_t beforeInMicroseconds{cluon::time::toMicroseconds(before)};
13972 const int64_t afterInMicroseconds{cluon::time::toMicroseconds(after)};
13973
13974 const int64_t timeSpent{(afterInMicroseconds > beforeInMicroseconds) ? (afterInMicroseconds - beforeInMicroseconds) / 1000 : 0};
13975 const int64_t timeToSleepInMilliseconds{TIME_SLICE_IN_MILLISECONDS - timeSpent};
13976
13977 // Sleep the remaining time.
13978 if ((timeToSleepInMilliseconds > 0) && (timeToSleepInMilliseconds <= TIME_SLICE_IN_MILLISECONDS)) {
13979 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::duration<int64_t, std::milli>(timeToSleepInMilliseconds));
13980 } else {
13981 std::cerr << "[cluon::OD4Session]: time-triggered delegate violated allocated time slice." << std::endl;
13982 }
13983 } while (delegateIsRunning && !TerminateHandler::instance().isTerminated.load());
13984 }
13985}
13986
13987inline bool OD4Session::dataTrigger(int32_t messageIdentifier, std::function<void(cluon::data::Envelope &&envelope)> delegate) noexcept {
13988 bool retVal{false};
13989 if (nullptr == m_delegate) {
13990 try {
13991 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck{m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegatesMutex};
13992 if ((nullptr == delegate) && (m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates.count(messageIdentifier) > 0)) {
13993 auto element = m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates.find(messageIdentifier);
13994 if (element != m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates.end()) {
13995 m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates.erase(element);
13996 }
13997 } else {
13998 m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates[messageIdentifier] = delegate;
13999 }
14000 retVal = true;
14001 } catch (...) {} // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14002 }
14003 return retVal;
14004}
14005
14006inline void OD4Session::callback(std::string &&data, std::string && /*from*/, std::chrono::system_clock::time_point &&timepoint) noexcept {
14007 size_t numberOfDataTriggeredDelegates{0};
14008 {
14009 try {
14010 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck{m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegatesMutex};
14011 numberOfDataTriggeredDelegates = m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates.size();
14012 } catch (...) {} // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14013 }
14014 // Only unpack the envelope when it needs to be post-processed.
14015 if ((nullptr != m_delegate) || (0 < numberOfDataTriggeredDelegates)) {
14016 std::stringstream sstr(data);
14017 auto retVal = extractEnvelope(sstr);
14018
14019 if (retVal.first) {
14020 cluon::data::Envelope env{retVal.second};
14021 env.received(cluon::time::convert(timepoint));
14022
14023 // "Catch all"-delegate.
14024 if (nullptr != m_delegate) {
14025 m_delegate(std::move(env));
14026 } else {
14027 try {
14028 // Data triggered-delegates.
14029 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck{m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegatesMutex};
14030 if (m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates.count(env.dataType()) > 0) {
14031 m_mapOfDataTriggeredDelegates[env.dataType()](std::move(env));
14032 }
14033 } catch (...) {} // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
14034 }
14035 }
14036 }
14037}
14038
14039inline void OD4Session::send(cluon::data::Envelope &&envelope) noexcept {
14040 sendInternal(cluon::serializeEnvelope(std::move(envelope)));
14041}
14042
14043inline void OD4Session::sendInternal(std::string &&dataToSend) noexcept {
14044 m_sender.send(std::move(dataToSend));
14045}
14046
14047inline bool OD4Session::isRunning() noexcept {
14048 return m_receiver->isRunning();
14049}
14050
14051} // namespace cluon

14053 * Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Christian Berger

14056 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
14057 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
14058 */
14059
14060//#include "cluon/ToODVDVisitor.hpp"

14064namespace cluon {
14065
14066inline std::string ToODVDVisitor::messageSpecification() const noexcept {
14067 std::stringstream tmp;
14068 for (const auto &e : m_forwardDeclarations) { tmp << e; }
14069 tmp << m_buffer.str();
14070
14071 const std::string retVal{tmp.str()};
14072 return retVal;
14073}
14074
14075inline void ToODVDVisitor::preVisit(int32_t id, const std::string &shortName, const std::string &longName) noexcept {
14076 (void)shortName;
14077 m_buffer << "message " << longName << " [ id = " << id << " ] {" << '\n';
14078}
14079
14080inline void ToODVDVisitor::postVisit() noexcept {
14081 m_buffer << '}' << '\n';
14082}
14083
14084inline void ToODVDVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, bool &v) noexcept {
14085 (void)typeName;
14086 (void)v;
14087 m_buffer << " "
14088 << "bool"
14089 << " " << name << " [ default = false, id = " << id << " ];" << '\n';
14090}
14091
14092inline void ToODVDVisitor::visit(uint32_t id, std::string &&typeName, std::string &&name, char &v) noexcept {
14093 (void)typeName;
14094 (void)v;
14095 m_buffer << " "
14096 << "char"
14097 << " " << name << " [ default = '0', id = " << id << " ];" << '\n';
14098}
